Iyo ubona ibitagenda neza aho uherereye urapfukama ugasiguza Imana, ugaheza ugahabga ikibereye ukwiriye gukora kugira ngo ibintu bigende neza. Imana ivuze, utegerezwa kubaduka ukerekeza ku kiyaga, Farawo akagukurikira, ukiroha mu kiyaga nkâ€™uko yabikubariye ukajabuka hakurya kugira ngo Farawo nâ€™ingabo ziwe bahonere aho wakiriye. Utegerezwa guca mu bugaragwa ukahasonzera kandi ukahanyoterererwa kugira ngo uboneugutabarwa nâ€™Imana. Kandi wambutse Yorodani, nta bakunzi uhasanga

ngo bakwakire, bakugaburire canke bagukande umuruho wo mu bugaragwa. Haba namba, ahubgo ushikira kurwana nâ€™ibigatanya kugira ngo wegukire igihugu gitemba amata nâ€™ubuki. Ico nico abavugishwa ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi batazi. Bameze nka za nyigisho zâ€™ububeshi bgâ€™imigisha abanyamadini bakwiragiza ngo Â« Cakira viza, cakira inzu, cakira imodoka, cakira inzahabu, cakira abagore nâ€™abagabo bâ€™abandi, cakira ibihugu vyâ€™abandi, â€¦ uwuraho nawe yisinziririye mwâ€™itiro ryâ€™urupfu, ngo: Ndakiriye!Â» Abahendesha abantu ibintu nkâ€™ivyo ni nkâ€™ibicu bikubebga nâ€™umuyaga [Abanyefeso 4:14, Zaburi 35:5, 2 Petero 2:17]Uhoraho Imana arakora ibitangaza agahagurutsa abasore nâ€™inkumi, abagabo nâ€™abagore buzuye urukundo nâ€™ubutwari kugira barwanira igihugu cabo kandi ikabaha inkomezi, ikanabafasha kurwanya umwansi bagatabara igihugu bakagikiza amakuba.Murâ€™iyo ntambara, Uhoraho Imana arashobora kurungika izindi ingabo mutazi zâ€™abamalayika zirongowe na Malayika mukuru Mikaheli zikaza gufasha ingabo zâ€™ubgoko bgâ€™Imana bagakora ku buryo bga ba Ruburakigongwe. Ivyo turabisanga mu bihe vya kera no murâ€™ibi bihe. Intambara irangiye, Imana ishikiriza igihugu abo yagitoranirije maze abo bamalayika bakisubirira mwâ€™ijuru. Abatoranijwe bashikirizwa igihugu kugira ngo bagitunganirize abariho nâ€™abazovuka ku buryo atanzara, atabukene, atakarenganyo no gusenga ibigirwamana, ubupfumu, uguhamagara imizimu nâ€™uburozi biharangwa. Abo, iyo baciye kubiri nâ€™ivyagezwe vyâ€™Imana, irabarungikira abansi babo bakabatera bagasambura iterambere ryose bagezeko, bakabica bakabangaza gushika bicujije bakihana Imana igasubira kubagirira imbabazi. Mubavuga ivyerekeye isezerano ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi, ku ruhande rumwe bamwe bigize abagwanya amaleta nâ€™imigambge, abandi bigira ababiburanira. Ku rundi ruhande, hariho abiyemeje kugwanya amadini nâ€™amashengero nâ€™abandi batazi urugamba barimwo bakivugira ibibajemwo vyose. Murâ€™abo, benshi barihenda bakabeshera Uhoraho Imana kubera kutabanza kwiga ngo batahure ivyo baba bumvise, babariwe canke beretswe, hari nâ€™aho bayibeshera kuko baba bashaka kuvuga ibintu bituma abantu babemera. Abo bose barabesha bagasuka abantu. Batwara ibintu ukutariko bakigisha abandi kuba ibinebge ntibitegurire gukorera igihugu Imana yabahaye:

title: Nicolas BIGIRIMANA na Lambert MUHIMPUNDU BAKWURUYEÂ KWIHANA
content:
Murâ€™iyi minsi hariko haribonekeza mu gihugu cacu ibimenyetso Uhoraho Imana yabuye kuva kera ikoresheje abahanuzi batandukanye, abantu biyadukiza bakigira ibi na biriya ntibatinye no guhindukiza ijambo ryâ€™Imana ryanditswe muri Bibiliya Yera. Â Ishengero rya Yesu Kristo Ihanga Ryera ryâ€™Imana ryahamagariwe kuzigama ukuri kwâ€™ijambo ryâ€™Imana ntirishobora kwihanganira abahona kubera ubuzimire basukwamwo nâ€™abo bariko barakubagurwa nâ€™impwemu zihumanye biyitirira amasezerano Uhoraho Imana yahaye Ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi.

Mwarumvise umugabo yitwa Muhimpundu Lambert yiyimikiye kuba umwami nâ€™umuherezi, amategeko yâ€™igihugu akamuta mu mvuto. Uyo yabanje kuza kwabura ubuhanuzi Ihanga Ryera ryâ€™Imana rihabga hanyuma atamaze kabiri anyererera mu bgibone. Yasutse abantu batari bake hanyuma mu kurogota kwiwe atangura kugenda arigisha abantu ngo: â€œKristo ni ikivume!â€ mu guca kubiri nâ€™ivyanditswe muri[1Abikorinto 12:3]. Abakurikiye inyigisho zâ€™umugararizo ziwe bamerewe nabi mu mabohero yo mu Rutana, Gitega, Ngozi na Bujumbura. Hadashize kabiri, uwundi nawe yanduye nya mpwemu yâ€™ubgibone ikubagura abantu banse gukizwa neza kugira ngo bashike ku musaraba wâ€™uwabambge agacungura abaremwe bose.

Uwo nawe ni Nicolas Bigirimana avuka mu ntara ya Gitega mugabo bakaba barimukiye mwâ€™Ishatanya ryo muri Komine KINYINYA mu ntara ya RUYIGI. Yaragize ivyago araraswa mu magume aca aja kuvurirwa mu gihugu ca Tanzaniya aho yahavuye aronkera amahirwe yo kujanwa gutura mu gihugu ca AUSTRALIYA. Ubu aba murâ€™ico gihugu muri Qweensland ahitwa Brisbane. Nti twotaye umwanya tuvuga ivyiwe kuko ntari ico yivugako ari ahubgo abamuzi bavuga yuko afise akagorane. Umuco wâ€™Imana ahâ€™uri ntunyegezwa. Dushimye kugira ico tumuvuzeko kugira ngo dukemure abantu bahendwa bagasahurwa utwabo canke bagasukwa mu rupfu kubera ubugunge bgâ€™ibikoresho vya satani. Hariho murâ€™abo biyita abakozi bâ€™Imana, abahanuzi nâ€™abasemerezi baribisha uruyeri, bagakora icaha co gufata abakenyezi ku nguvu hakaba nâ€™abafise akagwara ko mu mutwe bita (Narcistic Personalty disorder) twokwita â€œNshakagutazirwaâ€ gatuma bata abantu mu kaga bakoresheje ibinyoma.

Kwâ€™igenekerezo rya mbere Nzero uyu mwaka wâ€™i 2024, uwoNicolas Bigirimanayarubahutse kwifata amajwi arayanyanyagiza ku mihora ngurukanamajambo avuga yuko yiyimikiye kuba â€œUmwami wâ€™abamiâ€ nâ€™â€Umuherezi Mukuruâ€ akongerako nâ€™ayandi majambo yo kwigira utarabaho kwâ€™isi. Yagumye asubiramwo amarogotano yiwe mu majwi yifata kenshi na bugingo nâ€™uyu munsi.

Mu yandi majambo menshi uyoNikola Bigirimanaavuga yiyita Umwami nâ€™umuhanuzi, yerekana yuko atoragura ubuhanuzi buvugwa hirya no hino ku mbuga akabgiyitirira kandi bikamunanira kubujanisha nâ€™ijambo ryâ€™Imana kuko ata nâ€™iryo asoma ngo atahure.

Nikola Bigirimana, avuga yuko Imana yamuhaye amasezerano ya Adamu na Eva, Mose na Eliya, Dawidi na Salomo. Vuba azokwongerako nâ€™aya Mariya na Yozefu! Ivyâ€™avyuga nâ€™ikimenyetso cerekanako abamukunda bomwirukira kwa muganga kuko aguma anicurako bomugirira nabi bakoresheje amangetengete. Iyo atanguye kuvuga niho umuntu amenyera ico ari kuko aca anyererera mu vyiyumviro vyâ€™ibuzamyi no guhahamuka kubera ivyo yakorewe. Ntawoha agaciro ivyo avuga. Muzohore musuzumisha ijambo ryâ€™Imana impwemu zose ziserura nâ€™ibikorwa vyazo bizobabagaragariza.

Abo bagabo uko ari babiri ico bahuriyeko nâ€™uko bose basuka abantu bakabata mu kaga kandi bagacurika Ivyanditswe Vyera mu kwiyitirira amasezerano Uhoraho Imana yahaye ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi. Uwobahanura yobasaba kwakira Yesu Kristo kubabera Umwami nâ€™umukizwa wâ€™ubugingingo bgabo bagaca bihana ivyaha bagendana bakezwa.

Umwami Yesu Kristo Yamamare!

title: Inzira indwi zo gutabara no gukiza igihuguÂ câ€™Uburundi.
content: Ni igitabo kidonda ivyerekeye urutonde rwâ€™Uboraho Imana abantu benshi birengagiza. Abarongora igihugu canke ishengero baciye kubiri nâ€™urwo rutonde baba bakwegere akarambaraye abo barongoye. Iyo umurongozi arimwo impwemu mbi ababa mu gihugu nâ€™igihugu ubgaco kirakubagugwa nâ€™inzara, ubukene, akarenganyo nâ€™ibiza. Uwo muntu atabogojwe nâ€™intwari Imana iravyimorera igakoresha ibintu biteye ubgo nkâ€™ivyago cumi kandi abifatanije nawe mu caha bakahagwa. Ibikiza igihugu si imigambge, amoko, amasezerano yâ€™abantu, imigwi canke imfashanyo zitangwa nâ€™ibihugu vyo hanze. Igihugu gikizwa no kwubakira ku rutonde rwashinzwe nâ€™Imana. Ibikogwa biboneka atari amajambo nâ€™amanama niryo soko ryâ€™iterambere.Ababishoboye bogisoma kirimwo ingene twova mu ngorane zose twikwegera. Uyu mwanditsi avugamwo ivyerekeye urutonde Imana yashinze kuva ikirema isi muri rusangi mugabo ageze kuvyerekeye Uburundi agatomora neza ivyokorwa mu maguru masha kugira ngo Abarundi dutere imbere mu mibano, mu ndero, mu ntwaro, mu butunzi, mwâ€™iterambere, muvyo twemera, mu gutumatumanako, no mukwidagaduraâ€¦Indongozi zikoreye ku buhinga butangwa murâ€™iki gitabu twotera imbere tukarengana nâ€™ibindi bihugu. Igihugu gitezwa imbere nâ€™abahinga, incabgenge abanyengabire nâ€™abakunda igihugu bakorera mu kugororoka. Amasezerano ko ashitse umwe wese yitegurire gukorera muvyo Imana yamugeze [Zaburi 127:1-5]

title: Imburi ya nyuma: Ngaho ni mwihane mwezwe vya biheÂ birabashikiye.
content:
IHANE MWEZWE MWITEGURIRE INGAJI Yâ€™UHORAHO MU BURUNDI

Tumaze imyaka 35 twumvise ivyerekeye amasezerano Uhoraho Imana yahaye ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi. Dutangure kuyasengera haheze imyaka 25, Mpwemu Yera yaratubariye ivyiza biyarimwo, aca atubarira yuko arâ€™ayacu azoyadushitsako.Haheze imyaka 10 Umuremyi wâ€™isi nâ€™ijuru adutegetse kuyatangariza abantu bose adutuma yuko bokwihana bakezwa kugira ngo ntibazohitanwe nâ€™inkota ya malayika muranduzi.Twakwiragiye intara zose zâ€™igihugu câ€™Uburundi dushika no mu mpande zine zâ€™isi tumenyesha abantu bose ivyerekeye ayo masezerano tunabasaba kwihana no kwiyeza kugira ngo bazibonere ubgiza bgâ€™Imana. Uretse no kwishikira hose twaruguruye imihora yo gushikira bose turanabicisha no mu bitabo, ibinyamakuru nâ€™amaradiyo ku buryo ata murundi nâ€™umwe atayumvise. Imana yaranahagurukije abasemerezi bâ€™abarundi nâ€™abavugishwa mva makungu kugira ngo baburire Abarundi bose.Murâ€™iyo myaka 10 yo gusemerera twahuye na vyinshi. Baratwise abasazi, abagwanya amaleta, abazimiye nâ€™ayandi mazina yâ€™urwanko mugabo Uhoraho Imana yaraturemesheje ngo dushikame dushirâ€™amanga ari kumwe natwe. Abatwiganye bose bakagomba kwiyitirira umugabi wâ€™Imana, bamwe barapfunzwe abandi baricwa nâ€™ipfuhe ryâ€™ Imana. Hariho abumvise ivyiza vyâ€™ayo masezerano baca bariyimika, biyimikira ihanga Imana itabahaye kubera amarangamutima yabo. Abazwi muribo ni Dr KATIKATI Armand, MUHIMPUNDU Lambert na BIGIRIMANA Nicolas. Hariho abandi benshi tuzi bagenda barabundabunda bayovya abantu ngo nibo â€œDAWIDIâ€. Ivyo vyose vyerekana abantu bakubagugwa nâ€™impwemu zihumanye. Abantu bazomenya uwo Imana yatoranije umunsi yimye ingoma canke Uhoraho we nyene niwe amubahishuriye. Uwo muzokwumva yivuze ntimuhe agaciro. Abaciye mwâ€™Ihanga Ryera bagasezererwa kubera vyabananiye kwezwa bagenda bararivuga nabi kubera ishari nâ€™ubube gito ngo Imana yarivuyemwo. Umuntu wese nâ€™asenge yisigurize Imana mwime amatwi ibikoresho vya wa mubi. Dukomeze gusengera abantu bose bazimiye.Uyu mwaka, Uhoraho Imana yatubariye yuko igikorwa yadutumye kiri ku musozo yuko igira ishitse ivyo yasezeranye. None turiko turasemerera akanyuma ngo uwutarezwa yezwe kuko igihe kirakuze. Ntihagire ushira umutima ku muntu nâ€™umwe mugabo muwushire kuri Yesu Kristo wenyene, Amen!

title: Itangazo ryâ€™Ihanga Ryera ryâ€™ImanaÂ 777/2024
content:
Nkuko musanzwe mubizi Ihanga Ryera ryâ€™Imana ni Ishengero rya Yesu Kristo  rikorera ku mugaragaro mu bihigu vyinshi vyo kwâ€™isi. Mu gihugu câ€™Uburundi rishinze imizi mu ntara zose zâ€™igihugu. Ahatari urusengero hari ibicaniro kandi niko bimeze no mu bindi bihugu vyo mu mahanga.

Hari ibicaniro mu bihugu vya Afrika , Amerika, Aziya, Canada, Ubulaya nâ€™igihugu ca Australiya. Mu masengero no ku bicaniro ni mukomeze kwigishna kwihana neza, ukwezwa no gusenga.

Ahariho hose kwâ€™isi, hariyo abo twabatije kandi tugomba yuko baramiriza mu gakiza. Uwo muzobona avuga canke ingendo yiwe idahuye nâ€™iyâ€™Abera muze mwihute mubitumenyeshe kugira ngo tubasengere kandi tubakanure. Twandikire kurâ€™izo nomero zâ€™abarongozi. Murakoze!

title: Uturanga 18 twâ€™abamalayika bâ€™Imana
content:
UTURANGA Â 18 TWâ€™ABAMARAYIKA

Duherutse kubabarira amazina yâ€™abamarayika bakuru nâ€™ivyo bajejwe gukorera abantu batumwe nâ€™Uhoraho Imana. Ubu naho reka tubabarire ibintu 18 Bibiliya ivuga ku mu marayika ukwiriye kumenya kugira ngo wirinde gukora ikosa ni mwahura kuko bagiye kuza baraboneka cane murâ€™ibi bihe. Abamarayika bafise ikibanza abantu badakunda gutahura muri Bibiliya kandi banditswe incuro 300 uhereye mwâ€™itanguriro gushika mu Vyahishuriwe Yohana. Baboneka nkâ€™abatumwa, abadukingira, abaturwanira nâ€™abama batazira Uhoraho Imana.

Abamarayika bavugwa nkâ€™abera, ibiremwa biteye igomwe vyâ€™umuco, bakorera umugambi wâ€™ukugororoka kwâ€™Imana. Ivyanditswe vyerekana yuko kubona umumarayika bidasanzwe kuko bishobora gutera ubgoba nâ€™ukujugumira[Matayo 28:2-4, Abacamanza 6:22].Bivugwa yuko basa nâ€™akabengebenge kitwa tarushishi, mu maso hasa nâ€™umuravyo nâ€™imuri zâ€™umuriro, amaboko nâ€™ibirenge vyiwe bisa nâ€™umuringa wâ€™umwakaka, kandi ijwi ryâ€™amajambo rimeze nkâ€™iryâ€™ishengero ryâ€™abantu[Daniyeli 10:6].

Bibiliya itubarira yuko Uhoraho Imana yaremye igitigiri câ€™abamarayika kidaharurika kuko kirengeye ivyiyumviro vyâ€™abana bâ€™abantu. Ubusumbasumbane bgabo buvugwa yuko ari amasinzi yâ€™ingabo zizengurutse intebe yâ€™inganji yâ€™Imana. Ibiharuro vyabo bikaba imiliyaridi nâ€™izindi nâ€™ibihumbi nâ€™ibihumbagiza[Abaheburayo 12:22, ivyahishuriwe Yohana 5:11].

Abamarayika baboneka muri Bibiliya nkâ€™intumwa zâ€™Imana, zitanga ubutumwa budasanzwe bgo kuyobora abantu[Luka 1:26-38, Itanguriro 16:7-11].Mu rurimi rwâ€™ikigiriki, ijambo Marayika risigura umutumwa. Batwara intumbero yâ€™Imana kandi bagashikiriza amabgirizwa yayo.

Mwâ€™ijuru, abamarayika baguma bahimbaza kandi batazira Uhoraho Imana. Bazengurutse intebe yâ€™inganji yâ€™Uhoraho Imana baririmba indirimbo zâ€™amashimwe.[Ivyahishuriwe Yohana 5:11-12, Yesaya 6:3].Baguma baha icubahiro Uhoraho Imana berekana ubutware nâ€™ukugororoka kwiwe.

Hari igihe abamarayika bahabga amabanga nâ€™Uhoraho Imana yo gukingira no gutabara Abera bâ€™Imana kugira ngo ntibahure nâ€™akabi[Zaburi 91:11-12, Daniyeli 6:22].Bashobora guseruka ku buryo buboneka mu gutabara, bagakingira kandi bagatanga intumbero ku bizera mu buryo butangaje.

Hari ibihe abamarayika bashira mu ngiro imanza zâ€™Uhoraho Imana ku banyakibi no kubanyavyaha banse kwâ€™ihana[Itanguriro 19:1-29, 2 Abami 19:35].Murâ€™ico gihe baba ibikoresho vyo guhana canke gusambura mu kwubahiriza amategeko yâ€™Imana ku banyavyaha nâ€™abagumutsi.

Naho abamarayika bafise ububasha kandi bejejwe, sâ€™abo gusengwa. Ugusengwa nâ€™ukwo Uhoraho Imana wenyene.[Ivyahishuriwe Yohana 22:8-9, Abikolosayi 2:18].Nâ€™iyo hagize uwugerageza kubasenga, bo nyene baramwiburiza bati usenge Uhoraho Imana wenyene, nayo jewe ndâ€™umusavyi wâ€™Imana nkawe. Iyo umuntu apfuye ntacika umumarayika, ni ikinyoma.

Bibiliya iratwereka yuko hariho ubutandukane hagati yâ€™ubgoko bgâ€™abamarayika bujana nâ€™amabanga bajejwe nkâ€™abamarayika bakuru nâ€™abakerubi[Yuda 1:9, Ezekiyeli 10:1-22]. Bamwe baboneka bafise ubusumbasumbane nâ€™ibikorwa bajejwe mu mabanga atandukanye yâ€™ijuru.

Abamarayika ntibafise ubumenyi bgâ€™ibintu vyose nkâ€™Uhoraho Imana. Hariho nâ€™ibintu usanga batazi[Matayo 24:36, 1 Petero 1:12].Ubumenyi nâ€™ugutahura kwabo naho bazi vyinshi cane, kurafise aho Uhoraho Imana yakugarukirije.

Ivyanditswe vyinshi birerekana yuko abamarayika bakora nkâ€™abarinzi canke abategeka amahanga. Baguma bayobora abantu muvyo bakora nkâ€™uko babitumwe nâ€™Uhoraho Imana[Daniyeli 10:13-21, 12:1].

Mwâ€™ijuru, abamarayika baranezererwa abanyavyaha bihanye bagahindukirira Uhoraho Imana[Luke 15:10].Ugukizwa kwâ€™umuntu wese kuzana umunezero no kunezererwa mu ngabo zo mwâ€™ijuru nkâ€™uko Imana ivyipfuza.

Umwami Yesu Kristo yaravuze yuko abamarayika batarongorana canke ngo barondoke.[Matthew 22:30].Ni ibinyabugingo vyo mu mpwemu atabushobozi bgâ€™umubiri bgo kurongorana no kurondoka nkâ€™uko abantu bameze. Tuzogaruka kurâ€™iki dusigura [Itanguriro 6:1-4, na Yobu 1:6,2:1,38:7]kubiyumvirako bari abamarayika barongoye abantu.

Incuro nyinshi muri Bibiliya, abamarayika babonekeye abantu bafise ishusho yâ€™abantu nyene. Rimwe na rimwe, abantu ntibashobora kubamenya yuko basanzwe ari abamarayika.[Abaheburayo 13:2, Itanguriro 18:1-3].Bashobora gufata ishusho yâ€™umuntu kugira ngo bashobore kuyaga nâ€™umuntu bamuha ubutumwa bgâ€™ijuru.

Abamarayika bashobora kuba abagwanyi, abasirikare bagwanya inkomezi zâ€™ababi. Bagwana mu buryo bgâ€™umubiri no mu buryo bgâ€™impwemu.[Ivyahishuriwe Yohana 12:7-9, 2 Abami 19:35]. Iyo bari mu ntambara yâ€™impwemu barashobora no gushira mu ngiro urubanza rwâ€™Imana no gukingira Abera.

Abamarayika baboneka bariko baratanga ubuhanuzi bgâ€™Imana ku bantu. Nibo bavuga ibigiye gushika nâ€™umugambi wâ€™Imana.[Daniyeli 9:20-23, Zekariya 1:9]. Barashobora no gusigura inyereko bakanerekana uko umugambi wâ€™Imana uriko urashitswa.

Mu gihe gikenewe, abamarayika haraho barungikwa gufasha abantu canke kubahumuriza.[Abaheburayo 1:14, Ivyakozwe nâ€™Intumwa 12:5-11].Bashobora kwerekereza aba-Kristo no kubaremesha mu kibanza câ€™Imana.

Umumarayika ntashobora kuba mu bibanza vyinshi icarimwe nkâ€™uko Uhoraho Imana ameze.[Daniyeli 9:21-23].Naho bashobora kwiyunguruza ku buryo bgâ€™igitangaza kandi bagashika aho umuntu atiyumvira, aho bari haramenyekana.

Abamarayika ni ibiremwa vyâ€™Imana, si nkâ€™Uhoraho kuko bafise intango.[Abikolosayi 1:16, Nehemiya 9:6].Naho babayeho imbere yâ€™abantu, ni ibiremwa.

Wiyumvira yuko woba warabonye umumarayika? Twandikire tubiyage.

title: Abarundi mumenye ivyerekeye abamarayika bâ€™Imana kuko mugiye kubabona kenshi muÂ gihugu
content:
ABAMALAYIKA BAKOMEYE BAKORANA Nâ€™ABANTUHariho abamalayika bavugwa cane muri Bibiliya no mu bindi bitabo mugabo amadini nâ€™amashengero menshi abaziko ibintu bike cane. Abamalayika ni ivyaremwe biba mwâ€™ijuru. Bamwe baboneka bafise amababa abandi basa nkâ€™abantu nkatwe, baza kudufasha no kutwerekeza batumwe nâ€™Uhoraho Imana. Umwe wese muribo afise ico ajejwe nâ€™ibikorwa adukorera nkâ€™uko bafise nâ€™ivyo bakora mwâ€™ijuru. Abo batumwa bâ€™Imana ntitubategeka kandi ntitubasenga mugabo dushobora kuyaga nabo iyo batuganirije. Umuntu wese arakwiriye kumenya ivyerekeye abamalayika kuko hari nâ€™igihe Uhoraho Imana aza mwâ€™ishusho yâ€™umumalayika nkâ€™igihihe ca Aburahamu [Itanguriro 18:1-33], Hagayi [Itanguriro 16:7-11], Mose [Kuvayo 3:2], ikoraniro ryâ€™Abisirayeli [Abacamaza 1:2], Gidiyoni [Abacamanza 6:12] nâ€™abandi.UMUMALAYIKA MURINZI WAWEUmuntu wese akijijwe arafise Malayika murinzi wiwe ajejwe ku mukuza muvyo impwemu. Agendana nawe kugira ngo akurinde, agutumbereze mu nzira nziza kandi agufashe mu gakiza. Uwo mu malayika uhabga akorana nawe gusa akaba yuzuye urukundo nâ€™ukwihangana kandi akama hafi yawe. Ntaguhata canke ngo yisuke muvyo ubuzima bgawe kiretse umukundiye. Ariko iyo ugira wicwe igihe cawe co gutaha kitaragera, hari igihe yihutira kugukingira. Kenshi uri mu nzira wenyene uriko aratambuka hariho nâ€™igihe umwikanga ukaraba inyuma nkâ€™uko hari umuntu agukurikiye. [Ivyakozwe nâ€™Intumwa 12:15]MALAYIKA MUKURU AZRAELNi malayika wâ€™urupfu. Mu bisanzwe akora akazi ko gutandukanya umubiri nâ€™ubugingo. Niwe yakira abapfuye ako kanya mwâ€™iparadizo. Aravugwa cane mu vyanditswe vyera yuko ari malayika murimbuzi. Muri [2 Samweli 24:15-16] avugwa yuko ari Malayika ageseza abantu. Muri [2 Ingoma 21:15], uwo mu malayika wâ€™Uhoraho yabonywe na Dawidi ari hagati yâ€™ijuru nâ€™isi, abanguriye inkota abansi bâ€™Ihanga ryâ€™Imana. Muri [Yesaya 37:36] uwo mu malayika wâ€™Uhoraho yururutse mwâ€™ijoro yica abasirikare 185.000, abantu bavyutse mugitondo basanze ari imirambikango. Uwo niwe yakubise urushi Herodi aturika inyo [Ivyakozwe nâ€™intumwa 12:23], yishe Ananiya na Safira [Ivyakozwe nâ€™Intumwa 5:1-25] nâ€™abandi benshi kuko nâ€™uyu munsi arakora.UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU CHAMUELIzina ryiwe risobanura â€œUwubona Uhoraho Imana wenyeneâ€ Uwo niwe agushoboza gutsinda ibihe bigoye vyâ€™imibabaro, ibibabaza umutima kandi ni nawe agufasha kumenya umufasha wawe wo mu mubiri. Ni umumalayikawâ€™amahoro nâ€™urukundo, imbabazi nâ€™ituze. [Zaburi 23:1-6]Page2

UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU GABRIELIzina ryiwe risigura â€œImana niyo nkomezi zanjeâ€ Uwo azwi yuko ariwe yazaniye Mariya na Yozefu ubutumwa bgâ€™ivuka rya Yesu Kristo. Azwi nâ€™umumalayika mukuru azanira abantu ubutumwa bgâ€™ijuru kandi niwe atunganiriza ingo nâ€™imiryango. [Luka 1:26-38]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU HANIELIzina ryiwe risigura â€œUbuntu bgâ€™Imanaâ€. Uwo niwe akurikirana abantu mu buzima bgabo kugira ngo baroranirwe bagire amahoro mu buzima. Niwe atuma ukura mu ngabire yawe yo kubona kure. Bivugwa yuko ariwe afise impfunguzo zâ€™ibirimba vyâ€™ijuru. Ni nawe yatwaye Enoki na Eliya mwâ€™ijuru badaciye mu rupfu. [Itanguriro 5:24]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU JEREMIEL, JERAHAMEELIzina ryiwe risigura â€œImbabazi zâ€™Imanaâ€ Igihe wumva ufise ivyo wiyagiriza canke ugomba kugira intumbero nshasha niwe aza kugukorera. Ni umumalayika wâ€™umunezero nâ€™ubushobozi bgo kubabarira kandi niwe atanga inzozi nâ€™inyereko. [Yoweli 2:28-32]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU JOPHIELIzina ryiwe risigura â€œUbgiza bgâ€™Imanaâ€ Niwe aramira abantu mu bihe bigoye akanigiza kure ivyiyumviro bibi. Yitwa malayika wâ€™ubgenge nâ€™ukubonekerwa, akanitwa malayika wo mwâ€™ijuru ryâ€™indwi. Ni nawe yaje kwirukana Adamu na Eva mu murima wa Edeni kandi niwe yagarutse gufata umutima wa Yesu Kristo i Gitsemane agira ababazwe. [ Iyahishuriwe Yohana 2:3-4]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU MICHAELIzina ryiwe risigura â€œWa wundi asa nâ€™Imanaâ€ Azwi nkâ€™umurinzi nâ€™umurwana ntambara. Niwe yirukana ubgoba nâ€™ivyiyumviro bidutera kwiganyira mu buzima bgacu.Niumukuruwâ€™ingabozirwanamuMpwemunomumubiri. [Daniyeli10:21, Yuda 1:9]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU RAGUELIzina ryiwe risigura â€œUmugenzi wâ€™Imanaâ€ niwe asuzuma yuko umumalayika wese arangura amabanga yiwe neza. Araza akaguhanura ico wokora mu bihe bigoye uba uriko uracamwo. Ni umumalayika wâ€™ubutungane nâ€™ubusabane bgâ€™Imana nâ€™abantu. Umuravye uko avugwa ni Yesu Kristo. [Ivyahishuriwe yohana 1:4-8]MALAYIKA MUKURU RAPHAELPage3

Izina ryiwe risigura â€œImana irakizaâ€ Niwe atumwa kuzana ugukira kwâ€™abagwaye mu buryo bgâ€™ibitangaza. Niwe yahora aza ku kidengeri ci Betesida akazikurura amazi maze abayitayemwo bagakira. [Yohana 5:1-4]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU SANDALPHONIzina ryiwe risigura â€œumuvukanyiâ€ bakavuga yuko ameze nkâ€™ihasa rya Malayika Metatron (mu Malayika atahura cane ubuzima bgâ€™ababa mwâ€™isi nâ€™ingorane bagira kuko yarayibayemwo imbere yuko aja kuba mwâ€™ijuru. Ni umumalayika wâ€™inkomezi) kuko nawe akora igikorwa co gutwara amasengesho yâ€™abantu mwâ€™ijuru kugira ngo abadayimoni ntibayatangire. Niwe atwara nâ€™amasezerano abantu bagirira Uhoraho Imana akayashikana. Azwi kandi nkâ€™umumalayika wâ€™umuziki nâ€™indirimbo mwâ€™ijuru akaba ari nawe afasha abaririmbira Imana kwâ€™isi. Niwe avugwa mu nyereko zo muri [Zaburi 34:7]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU URIEL (ARIEL)Izina ryiwe risigura â€œUmuco wâ€™Imanaâ€ rikongera rigasigura â€œIntare yâ€™Imanaâ€. Niwe mu bihe bigoye, igihe umuntu atazi ico akwiriye gukora araza akakwigisha, akakwereka inzira, akanakwereka ingene ubisohokamwo. Bavuga yuko atunganiriza nâ€™ibikoko nâ€™ibindi vyaremwe nâ€™Imana vyose. Ni umumalayika wâ€™ubgenge, umuco nâ€™ukuri kwâ€™Imana. Niwe mu malayika bavuga yuko arinze nâ€™amarembo yâ€™ijuru. Hari nâ€™abibaza yuko yoba ari umwigeme. Nâ€™uyo yamuritse Intumwa Pawulo hanyuma akumva ijwi rya Yesu Kristo. [Ivyakozwe nâ€™intumwa 9:9, 22:6-11]UMUMALAYIKA MUKURU ZADKIELIzina ryiwe risigura â€œUkugororoka kwâ€™Imanaâ€ Ni umumalayika afise ubushobozi budasanzwe. Niwe azwi nkâ€™umunyempuhwe nâ€™imbabazi kandi azana ihumure mu bihe bitoroshe. Niwe yasemereye abuza Aburahamu ngo ntatange umuhungu wiwe Isaka. [Itanguriro 22:1-19]Ni ivyingenzi gutahura ubushobozi, ububashanâ€™umugambi idufitiye mu kuturungikira abamalayika kubgo ubushobozi bga Mpwemu Yera. Abantu benshi baritiranya ibikorwa vyâ€™abamalayika nâ€™ivya Mpwemu wâ€™Imana. Abamalayika ni intumwa zâ€™Imana ziza gukora ibitangaje hano mu bantu ariko Mpwemu wâ€™Imana ni Uhoraho Imana, ni Yesu Kristo we nyene abana natwe mu buryo bga Mpwemu Yera.Woba wibaza yuko umaze kubona umumalayika canke umaze kwumva ijwi ryiwe? title: Imyaka 25 Imana itwemeje yuko isezerano ari iryacu nâ€™imyaka 10 tumazeÂ turyigisha.
content: MYAKA 25 IRARUMANYE UHORAHO ADUTUMYE GUTERAMIRA ISEZERANOBarundi Barundikazi, imyaka 25 iruzuye Uhoraho Imana aduhishuriye yuko isezerano yasezeraniye ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi ari iryacu nâ€™inzunganwe zizokurikira. Imyaka 10 nayo irarangiye Uhoraho adutumye kuryemanga, kuryigisha no kuritangariza abantu bose. Nkuko ihanga rya Isirayeli ryagendana nâ€™Uhoraho ari mu gicu, mu nkingi yâ€™umuriro nâ€™ahari isandugu yâ€™isezerano, uyu munsi twebge Ihanga Ryera ryâ€™Imana tugendana nâ€™Uhoraho Imana mu kugera ikirenge muca Yesu Kristo nâ€™intumwa ziwe. Mpwemu Yera akaturongora mu kuvugana natwe.Kuva Uhoraho aduhishuriye yuko isezerano ari iryacu, akanadutuma kuritangariza bose, tuguma dutera akamo Abarundi nâ€™abanyamahanga bose ngo bihane, bezwe kugira ngo bashitsweko ivyo Uhoraho Imana yasezeranye. Mugukora ivyo twifashisha ukwandika ibitabo, ivugabutumwa, gutangaza imburi nâ€™ubuhanuzi ku maradiyo, ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, amashengero nâ€™ibicaniro, nâ€™umunwa ku wundi kugira ngo umugambi wâ€™Imana uranguke. [Matayo 10:32]Muri rusangi, Abarundi twatanguye kwumva yuko twatoranijwe nâ€™Uhoraho Imana ngo tube Ihanga Ryera mu mwaka wi 1935, aho umuvugabutumwa wâ€™umusuwedi yitwa URI yaje mu Burundi mu bikorwa vyâ€™aba misiyonari. Uwo muvugabutumwa yaseruye muri uwo mwaka yuko yeretswe umuco ukoroka uvuye mwâ€™ijuru ugakorokera mu gihugu câ€™Uburundi maze ugakwira isi yose. Muri Myandagaro mu mwaka 1968, mu gikorane ca Pentekoti cabereye i Mugara, habayemwo ubuvugishwa bwinshi buvuga yuko Abarundi ari ihanga ryatoranijwe nâ€™Imana nkâ€™uko na Isirayeli yari yaratoranijwe. Ubwo buvugishwa bgahamagarira abantu bose kwihana, kwiyeza no kwintunganya bakoresheje kwisonzesha no gusenga cane.Mu myaka yakurikiye ubwicanyi bgo mu 1972, impunzi iyo zahungiye zaciye zitangura gusenga cane kubera ibihe bigoye zarimwo gushika naho hatangura kwururuka ubuvugishwa. Isezerano ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi ritangura kuvugishwako hirya no hino muri Tanzaniya, Congo, nâ€™Urwanda. Nâ€™Abarundi basigaye mu gihugu bararose inzozi, barerekwa kandi baravugishwa ku vyerekeye umuvyuro nâ€™ikanguro bizotangurira mu Burundi hanyuma bigakwira isi yose.Kugira ngo Uhoraho Imana yerekane kandi yemeze umugambi wayo ku Barundi, yarakoresheje nâ€™abanyamahanga baturuka mu bihugu bibanyi mbere no mu bihugu vya kure nka bulaya na Amerika. Rehinard Bonnke yagize iyerekwa ku Burundi ati: Â«Â Mbonye umuriro ukoroka uvuye mwâ€™ijuru urandagata Uburundi bwose hanyuma uca ukwira isi yose.Â Â» Aho yavuga ubushobozi bwâ€™umuvyuro nâ€™ikanguro bwâ€™ururutse buva mwâ€™ijuru. Hari nâ€™abandi benshi beretswe ivyâ€™amasezerano ku gihugu câ€™Uburundi. Ayo masezerano rero agira ashike ku gihugu vuba ni muyitegurire, niko Mpwemu wâ€™Imana avuga hirya no hino, Amen!

title: Imana ntirobanura ku butoni: Iruzuza Mpwemu Yera abakora ivyo kugororokaÂ vyose.
content:
Â«Â Petero yanzika kuvuga, ati Nâ€™ukuri ni ho nkimenya yukw Imana itarobanura abantu ku butoni, ariko mu mahanga yose uyubaha, agakora ivyâ€™ ukugororoka, iramwemera.Â Â»[Ivyakozwe nâ€™intumwa 10:34-35]

Ico twomenya nâ€™uko Imana abantu bose irabemera nkâ€™abo yaremye, kuko irabazi. Ariko hari abo yemera ifatiye kubirenze ivyo, bitewe nâ€™ubucuti bafitanye nayo, kurya no mubuzima harâ€™abo twemera ko ari abagenzi bâ€™inkoramutima.

Kimwe mubintu vyerekana ko Imana yakwemeye, nâ€™uko iguha kuri Mpwemu wayo(Mpwemu Yera).Â«Â Ivyako.nâ€™intumwa 5:32,Yohana 14:15-16â€³.

Kubatizwa muri Mpwemu Yera rero ni ikimenyetso cerekana ko yakwemeye. Ico gihe uhabwa ubushobozi butuma witahura, bukagufasha guhinduka, gukora ivyâ€™ Imana ishaka.

Aha niho benshi vyankira,kuko bashaka gukora ivyâ€™ Imana ishaka atabushobozi bararonka.Ntivyokunda, bisa no kugomba gutwara imodoka inywa igitoro kandi atakirimwo.

Kugira umuntu aronke Mpwemu Yera rero, bitegwa nâ€™ikibanza yabihaye mumutima, Imana iri mwâ€™ ijuru ikabona koko ko uyo muntu abikeneye,yamaramaje kuyikurikira. Ico gihe ahabwa ubushobozi bwa Mpwemu Yera.

Kubona abigishwa bamaze imisi cumi basenga, barindiriye isezerano rya Mpwemu Yesu amaze gusibira mwâ€™ijuru ,nâ€™ikimenyetso câ€™uko umuntu akwiye kurondera Imana nâ€™umwete,kugira ngo ahabwe ubushobozi bwa Mpwemu Yera.

Sinobabesha, umuntu adafise ubwo bushobozi, ahinduka umunyedini,umuntu akora ivyâ€™ imagenzo,ivyo mubwenge, kandi nâ€™ivyâ€™ agakiza ntabinezerererwa.Kubera iki?:

Nâ€™uko no mugakiza naho hari intambara. Umuntu aba akeneye kuremeshwa nâ€™uwo Mpwemu.No kugira umuntu yemere kuzira ivyo yizera, bisaba gushobozwa.

Intumwa zimaze guhabwa Mpwemu,zarashize amanga, ziva aho zari zinyegeje zivugira Yesu zidatinya no gupfa. Aha nimugihe iyo atabushobozi dutinya ivyo batuvuga kubwa Yesu.

Umuntu yahawe Mpwemu atangura kubabazwa nâ€™abari muvyaha,kuko yumva muri we ko bazorimbuka,nibatahinduka,bikamusunikira kubabwira ubutumwa. Aha ni mugihe iyo atabushobozi umuntu yisanga akunda isi,ivyaha biyirimwo akumva ntaco bimubwiye.Ata Mpwemu yera, nâ€™ubukristo ntagisobanuro bwoba bufise.

Dukwiye kuronderana umwete guhabwa Mpwemu Yera,niwe azodushoboza gukora ivyâ€™Imana ishaka, tukarangiza ubuzima bwacu twakoze ico twaremewe.

title: Ukuri: Edeni yari hehe? Ubgato bga Nowa babutoyeÂ hehe?
content: IREMWA RYâ€™ISI Nâ€™ABANTU, UMURIMA WA EDENI Nâ€™UBGATO BGA NOWAAbahinga nâ€™abashakashatsi bo kwâ€™isi barashoboye guhuza urukurikirine rwivyabaye kwâ€™isi nkukobidondwa muri Bibiliya nâ€™urukurikirane rwâ€™ingene ubuhinga bgâ€™isi bgagiye buratera imbere nkâ€™uko kahise kavyerekana gushika uyu munsi. Nta kintu na kimwe cerekana yuko ivyanditswe muri Bibiliya vyoba atari ukuri canke bitabaye uko vyanditswe.Barashoboye kumenya imyaka ibintu vyose vyabereyeko kuva mu mwaka wi 2500 YKA (Yesu Kristo Ataravuka) aho abanyegiputa bavumbura ubuhinga bgo gukora impapuro (Papyrus) zokwandikako nâ€™irangi ryo kwandikisha bagaca bashiraho amasomero. Ni murâ€™ico gihe nyene bataguye gukoresha ibintu bikozwe mu vyuma. Mu buzima bgâ€™abantu bavugwa muri Bibiliya, abahinga bamenye igihe Aburahamu yavukiye mu mwaka wi 2166 (YKA), igihe yinjiriye muri Kanani mu 1091, ukuvuka kwa Isaka 2066 (YKA), ukuvuka kwa Yakobo na Isawo mu 2006 (YKA)kuduga gushika mu mwaka wa 95 (YKY= Yesu Kristo Yaravutse).Mu bahinga nâ€™abashakashatsi bâ€™ubumenyi bgo mwâ€™isi no mu vyanditse, nta nâ€™umwe yashoboye kumenya umwaka isi yaremewe, igihe umuntu yaremewe nâ€™igihe Nowa yabaziyeko ubgato. Ico abantu bose bazi nuko Mose yoba yavutse hagati yâ€™Umwaka wa 1304 na 1237 YKA, akandika igitabo câ€™ITANGURIRO hagati yâ€™imyaka ya 1450 na 1410 YKA. Ico gitabo nico cerekana (1) Iremwa ryâ€™isi [Itanguriro 1:1-2:3], (2) Ivyerekeye umurima wa Edeni, Adamu na Eva, Kayini na Abeli, nâ€™uruvyaro rwa Adamu [Itanguriro 2:4-5:32], (3) Ivyerekeye ubgato bga Nowa, Umwuzure, ingene abantu basubiye kwuzura isi nâ€™ivyerekeye umunara wi Babeli [Itanguriro 6:1-11:32].Nkâ€™uko vyanditse muri Bibiliya, biboneka yuko Edeni yahera haruguru mu kigobe ca Perse igashika hepfo muri Mezopotamiya aho inzuzi za Tigris (Pishoni, Gihoni na Hiddekeli) hamwe na Epfrate (Phirati) zisukira mu nyaja. [Itanguriro 2:8-14] Biraboneka kandi yuko Nowa yabaye ahahora Edeni. Abahinga nâ€™abashakashatsi basanze ubgato bga Nowa buri mu gihugu ca Turikiya ku musozi Ararate bakemeza yuko ivya Nowa vyabaye mu imyaka 5500 ni 3000 YKA mu gihe abashakashatsi bavuga yuko Igitabo câ€™Itanguriro kidonda ivyabaye hagati yâ€™imyaka 8000 na 6000 gushika mu 2000 YKA.Muri Bibiliya niho abaremwe bose bamenyera ingene isi yaremwe, aho Edeni yariri nâ€™uko ivyâ€™umwuzure wa Nowa vyagenze. Ubuhinga nâ€™ubushakashatsi buhambaye nabgo nyene buza bushingira intahe yuko ivyanditswe muri Bibiliya ari ukuri kwuzuye. Ivyo ntibibuza yuko habaho abantu bivugira ivyo bibaza canke kubera urukundo bakunda igihugu cabo bavuga yuko Edeni yari iwabo. Edeni yabaye muri Afrika canke ikaba i Bulaya nico kimwe, ico twomenya nâ€™uko twogororoka kugira ngo tuzoragwe ubuzima budashira muri Yesu Kristo.

title: Korera mu ngabire wahawe nta muruho uzogira mu kubahoÂ kwawe.
content:
KORESHA INGABIRE YAWE.

Â«Â Petero aramubarira atâ€™ Ifeza nâ€™izahabu nta vyo mfise, arikw ico mfise ndakiguha: mw izina rya Yesu Kristo Umunyanazareti, va hasi utambuke.Â Â»[Ivyakozwe nâ€™intumwa 3:6]

Aha yarâ€™umuntu amugaye yamenyereye asegerereza, abonye Petero na Yohana aca abashurakâ€™umutima yibaza ngo harâ€™ico bari bumuhe. Petero niko kumubwira ko atafeza nâ€™izahabu afise. Ariko aca akoresha ingabire yarâ€™asanganywe,aramukiza mwâ€™izina rya Yesu.

Mwâ€™ishengero rya Kristo, ingabire za Mpwemu zifise igikorwa gikomeye amafaranga atoshobora gukora. Nivyo,amafaranga acemura vyinshi, harimwo kugura ibikoresho biba bikenewe,â€¦, ariko burya ingabire nizo zituma ibintu biba vyiza kurusha.

Benshi biyumva ko bariko bakorera mungabire zabo arâ€™uko baririmba,bavugâ€™ubutumwa,baprotokola, ariko burya ingabire ziruzuye, zitagira abazikoreramwo.

Umuntu ashobora kuja gusengera ahantu batamuzi, agataha atanâ€™uwumuramukije ngo amubaze iyo yaje ava. Akahasengera nkâ€™ukwezi kurenga atawumumenye, kandi abakristo bâ€™abasangwa buzuye urusengero. Wibaze!

Harâ€™abobitangira insiguro ngo nâ€™uko haba hasengera benshi, ariko sivyo. Kuko abo benshi nibo bokwakirana igishika abo bake, bakabaza amakuru yabo. Ariko abatari bake umwe wese aba ababaye ivyiwe. Bituma umuntu mushasha aje kwakira kristo aba inyakamwe,akamenyana na pasitori nâ€™abandi bake, nabo batamufitiye umwanya uhagije kubwâ€™amabanga menshi baba bajejwe. Ntagitangaje rero ko atokomera mugakiza, kiretse aronse abamuboneye izuba yigirako,bamuganiriza bakanamukomeza.

Benedata, kwakira abashitsi nâ€™ingabire ikomeye. Sâ€™ukubakira ngâ€™ubazimane, ahubwo nâ€™ugutuma bumva ko bisanze. Kandi ivyo si ibango risaba ko uba warasengewe,nâ€™igikorwa câ€™uwariwe wese iyo ari kurusengero iwabo. Petero ati Â«Â ifeza nâ€™izahabu ntavyo mfise,ariko ico mfise ndakiguha,â€¦Â Â»

Natwe dukwiye gukoresha ivyo dufise Imana yaduhaye. Nimba yaraduhaye amafeza, nayo tuyakoreshe no mumurimo wayo. Nimba atamafeza dufise,dukoreshe ubundi buryo yaduhaye,ingabire zacu, inguvu zacu,ubwenge bwacuâ€¦

Ishengero rya Kristo ryorushiriza gukomera, mugihe abaribarizwamwo bose bakoresha ingabire Imana yabahaye, ntihabemwo ba sindabizwa.

Mukazi ka misi yose abantu bakorera muri leta canke mu mashirahamwe bama mu ndyane bamwe bagahanwa abandi bakirukanwa Kubera yuko badakorera mu ngabire zabo. Bamwe bize ivyo badakunda abandi baronkejwe akazi kugira ngo baronke uko babaho gusa mugabo ata ngabire babifisemwe. Ivyo vyama bibatera ibibazo iminsi yose. Iyo umuntu akora akazi akoresha ingabire yiwe, ntavunika, nta mategeko amuremera kandi nta muntu nâ€™umwe amuca imbere ngo amurushe kubikora neza iyo atari ingabire zisumbana. Umuntu wese nâ€™arabe igisata kirimwo ingabire ziwe abe arico akoreramwo, umuyangayanga akorera ku macuniro areke kwigira umuganga avura abantu mu bitaro. Amen!

title: Uwakoranye na satani yaribiye amabanga ahambaye abera:Â Soma
Mube ivyitegererezo vyiza aho mubaye mu gukorera Imana musengeraÂ amasezerano.
content:
Hana yabaye icitegererezo kandi yatanze akarorero keza.

Â«Â Maze Hana asenga Uhoraho afise intuntu, arira cane, asezerana isezerano, atâ€™ Ewe Uhoraho Nyenâ€™ ingabo, ni waraba umubabaro wanje incoreke yawe, ukanyibuka, ntunyibagire jewe incoreke yawe, ukantabaza umwana wâ€™umuhungu, nanje nzomuguha, Uhoraho, abe uwawe kuzorinda apfa, kandi nta rupfuhe ruzomugera ku mutwe.Â Â»[1 Samweli 1:10-11]

Uyu mupfasoni Hana ni umwe muturorero twiza turi muri bibiliya. Yaraciye mukigeragezo co kubura uruvyaro, kandi agisokamwo amahoro Imana imutabaye. Reka turabe bimwe muvyo twomwigirako mukigeragezo ciwe, twoshira mu bikorwa natwe mu bikomeye twocamwo ivyâ€™arivyo vyose:

1.Hana yarasenga:

Buri mwaka, yama yaduze aja mungoro yâ€™Uhoraho kumushikanira ikimazi. Ninaho yaje gutura isengesho asaba akana, Imana yumva ugusenga kwiwe, iramwishura.Abizera dukwiye kuba turi abantu basenga, uko vyoba bimeze kwose. Ntidukwiye kurambirwa canke kubireka, kuko Imana irishura amasengesho ititaye kugihe kihaciye.

2.Hana yarakorera Imana.

Yama yaduze buri mwaka kuyitangira ikimazi. Ninako mukigeragezo dukwiye guhora dukorera Imana, uko dushobojwe. Gukorera Imana kwacu ntikukagenwe nâ€™ibihe, ahubwo bikwiye guhinduka umuco wacu, twaba turi mubihe vyiza canke bibi,kuko Imana iguma arâ€™Imana.

3.Hana yarihangana:

Yarâ€™afise mukeba wiwe Penina, yahora amurya umutima kuko atavyara, ariko Penina we akaba yaravyara.

Benedata,ukwihangana kwâ€™umuntu kurageragezwa,uko yoba ari kwose. Imana iyâ€™iretse abantu bakatugerageza,dukwiye kwihangana gushika twishuwe. Abantu bafise igihe co kukugerageza,iyo wihanganye Imana irakora ibikwiye ikagukura mugasuzuguro.

3.Hana yagize inyifato nziza imbere yâ€™umukozi wâ€™Imana.

Umuherezi Eli yamubonye arira ijwi ridasohoka,aca yibaza ngo yaborewe,aranabimubwira, ariko Hana yamwishuye neza ati ndâ€™umuntu yabonye amahano;nariko ndasuka amajojwa yanje imbere yâ€™Uhoraho, ntavino nanyoye.1sam1:15.

Sivyiza rero kubona umukozi wâ€™Imana nabi nâ€™ubwo yoba atagutahuye mukibazo urimwo. Ukwiye kubimusobanurira nâ€™uburwaneza,ntazoreka kugugesha umugisha,niyo atowuguhesha,Imana yo izowuguha. Rero Hana niko yabigenje,ku wâ€™inyifato nziza imbere yâ€™umukozi wâ€™Imana Eli, yaciyâ€™ amuhesha umugisha,ati Ni wigire amahoro; Imana ya isirayeli iguhe ico wayisavye. Kandi niko vyagenze,bidatevye Hana yaciye yibungenga.

Hana yari gushobora kwidodombera Eli umukozi wâ€™Imana, ariko yahisemwo kugira inyifato nziza imbere yiwe.

Hari abantu bihanganira ikigeragezo,ariko bakihangana bagira inyifato itari nziza(bakidodomba,bakavuga nabi,â€¦), mbere no gukorera Imana abatabivuyemwo bakagabanukirwa cane. Ariko siko bikwiye kumera.

Dukwiye kwigira kuri Hana.Yarasenga,agakorera Imana,akihangana,kandi akagira inyifato nziza.Iyâ€™umukristo avyifashemwo nkâ€™uko, asohoka mukigeragezo ciwe afise intahe nziza mumutima wiwe, kandi aba afise nâ€™ivyo yosangiza abandi vyo kubafasha; ikirenzeko,kubwo gusenga kwiwe,abona Imana imwiyereka mukumuha inkomezi,nomukumukura muvyo yabona bisa nâ€™ibidashoboka.

title: Tube abantu bâ€™ubgenge aho turi hose tudatinya gukoraÂ ivyiza.
content:
TWAME DUKORA IVYIZA.

Â«Â Twame dukora ivyiza, ntiducobogore, kukw igihe ni cashika tuzokwimbura, ni tutarambirwa.Â Â»[Abâ€™i Galatiya 6:9]

Gukora ivyiza biri muvyo umuntu wese yahuye na Yesu ahamagariwe. Kandi ntibiba ngombwa ko yirirwa arabisunikirwamwo kuko Yesu ari mumutima niwe abimuha kuvyiyumvamwo.Nico gituma uwamenye Imana arushiriza kunezerwa vyuzuye iyo ariko ivyiza.

Nâ€™ubwo kwikunda biri muri kamere ya buri muntu wese, ariko sivyo bitanga umunezero,mugihe umuntu atitaho ivyâ€™abandi. Ahubwokugaragariza urukundo abandi nivyo bituma umuntu yiyumva neza kurusha .

Kandi buriya iyo umuntu akoze iciza aba abivye mwâ€™isi yâ€™impwemu, kandi akazokwimbura. Nico gituma bibiliya ivuga ko gutanga bizana umugisha, kuruta guhabwa.

Ariko rero, hari ababiba neza kurusha abandi. Nkâ€™akarorero,umwe ashobora gukoresha udufaranga twiwe ashigikira impfuvyi, uwundi akadukoresha asororera abandi ngo babe barishimisha. Bose baba basohoye uburyo bwabo,ariko hari uwuba yabivye neza kurusha uwundi. Kwishimisha si icaha bitewe nâ€™uburyo umuntu abikozemwo, ariko ivyo ntivyokora kumutima wâ€™Imana ngo bitume iguhesha umugisha,nkâ€™uwagiye kuraba impfuvyi, abarwaye,â€¦

Dukwiye kumenya aho tubiba nâ€™ingene tubiba. Cane cane tukama twibuka ko ari ivyo twahamagariwe.

Ikindi twomenya, nâ€™uko iyo ubivye udaca wimbura ako kanya nyene. Ahubwo bifata igihe,ukanabagarira ivyo wabivye,hanyuma ukazokwimbura.

Benedata, hagati yo kubiba no kwimbura,hakwiye kubaho kutarambirwa. Imana izohesha umugisha ibikorwa vyiza vyâ€™amaboko yawe, ariko izobikora igihe co kwimbura kigeze.

Igihe kizogera Imana ikoreshe amaboko yâ€™abandi mukuguha ivyiza, nkâ€™uko nawe yakoresheje ayawe muguhesha abandi ivyiza. Kandi iyo umuntu yimbura, asarura vyinshi ugereranije nâ€™ivyo yabivye.

Â«Â Twame dukora ivyiza rero, ntiducobogore, kuko igihe nicashika tuzokwimbura,nitutarambirwaÂ Â».

Muhezagirwe.

content:
UMUGOROROTSI AZOMERERWA NEZA.

Â«Â Mubgire umugororotsi kw azomererwa neza, kukw azotungwa nâ€™ivyo ibikorwa vyiwe vyamuje.Â Â»[Yesaya 3:10]

Mwâ€™isi yose, abantu batinya Imana irabishimira. Bibiliya ivuga ngo abera bo mwâ€™isi nizo ntore nezerererwa. Ahandi naho ati inyonga zâ€™Uhoraho ziri kubagororotsi. Muyindi mvugo,isi,ibintu,â€¦ntagaciro bifise mumaso yâ€™Imana, vyose nâ€™ivyacu.

Umugororotsi azomererwa neza rero. Kumererwa neza Imana ivuga,si ugutunga vyinshi, ahubwo nâ€™ukugira akaneza ko mumutima, ukanezerererwa ubuzima kubwâ€™Imana wamenye.

Iyo ugerageza gukora ivyo Uhoraho ashaka,aguha kunyurwa,amahoro,Umunezero,â€¦Satani rero akora ibishoboka vyose, ngo yibagize abizera Imana isoko yâ€™umunezero wabo, mukubereka ivyo bakenye. Gutyo akabanyaga amahoro.

Nimba ibifadika arivyo soko yâ€™umunezero wacu, abizera ba mbere babayeho batishimye, kuko bo bagurishije ivyabo, umwe wese agahabwa ico akenye, hanyuma hagatera guhamwa, bamwe bakangazwa abandi bakicwa.Ariko, kuri bo Imana bizeye yababereye vyose, babaho banezerewe,banyuzwe, bishimiye agakiza bakiriye, bari bamerewe neza mumutima kubwâ€™ Imana yabo.

Imana rero izoguha kumererwa neza mumutima, ubihawe nâ€™ubuntu bwayo, ariko kandi kuko ari Imana yitwararika abayo, izoguhezagira bivanye nâ€™uko ibona ko ari vyiza kuri wewe, bigutere intege zo kubandanya kuyikorera.Â«Â Umugororotsi azomererwa nezaÂ Â».

title: Abanyamasezerano bose basabga kwiyeza no kwiyambura umururazi ku magenekerezo ya 28 naÂ 29/02/2024
content: ABANYAMASEZERANO BOSE BASABGE KWEZWA Nâ€™UKWIKURA UMURURAZIUmukozi wâ€™Imana wo mu Ntara ya Rumonge yatumwe ku banyamasezerano bose ngo murâ€™iyi minsi ibiri irangiza ukwezi kwa kabiri 28-29/02; mwese mwiyeze kandi mwitunganye cane mu kwiyambura umururazi uri mu mitima kugira ngo ntimupfe ahubgo mushikire amasezerano murindiranye igishika.Uwundi mukozi wâ€™Imana wo mu ntara ya Bujumbura yavugishijwe yuko abantu mwese murindiriye amasezerano Imana yahaye igihugu câ€™Uburundi musabge gufata iminsi 28-29/02, ibe iminsi yo kuduga umusozi wo kwezwa no gutunganya kuko imbere hari ibikomeye.Ukwiyeza nâ€™inzira umuntu atangura kandi akabandanya mu gukurikira Yesu Kristo. Ni uguhinduka mu vyiyumviro, mu mbono yâ€™ibintu, mu ntumbero, mu mvugo no mu ngiro. Ukwezwa gutangura iyo twaturiraniye ivyaha vyacu vyose tugasaba imbabazi kuko bituma Uhoraho Imana aduharira kandi akatweza ibigabitanyo vyacu vyose. [1Yohana 1: 9]Umururazi uwumvira mu mutima wawe nta jambo uronka yo kuwusobanura. Umururazi umeze nkâ€™inkota ikarishe, nkâ€™umwampi usongoye, urura nkâ€™umubirizi, ukababa nkâ€™urwaga, ugasharira nkâ€™ipilipili mu gisebe kandi ukababaza nkâ€™ubumara mu mutima. Umururazi uterwa nâ€™ishavu ryinshi, ishari nâ€™inzigo, ubushangashirwe nâ€™urwanko, ubukene nâ€™ukwipfuza, ukurenganywa nâ€™ukuvugwa nabi, uguhebga nâ€™uguhemukirwa, ukutababarirwa nâ€™ukutababarira. Ni ibibabaza umutima vyose. Abafise umururazi biremeshereza mu bushakanyi, uburake, igono, gusenga ibigirwamana, uburozi, ikeba, ibice, kuborerwa, urwanko, nâ€™amacakubiriâ€¦ Umuntu afise umururazi naho avuga yuko yubaha Imana yama afise ishavu, intuntu, yicura ikibi, yicurikira, avuga nabi canke akagira uburyarya, agira umutima udadaraye kandi arabishe kuyaga. Suzuma rero kiwe cose yuko atakitari muri wewe.Uhoraho Imana aratubarira uko dukira umururazi: â€œMwiyambure umururazi wose no kujingitwa nâ€™uburake no gutongana no gutukana bibavemwo, hamwe nâ€™inzigo yose. Mugiriranire neza, mugiriranire imbabazi, muhariranire nkuko Imana yabahariye muri Kristo Yesu.â€ [Abanyefeso 4:31-32] Iyo umuntu yirukanye umururazi mu mutima wiwe, ujana nâ€™ivyipfuzo vya kameremere kâ€™umubiri. Mu muntu yihanye akiyambura umururazi, mu mutima wiwe haca hinjiramwo ivyamwa vya Mpwemu Yera: â€œUrukundo, umunezero, amahoro, ukwihangana, kugira neza, ingeso nziza, kuba umwizigirwa, uburwanezaâ€ [Abigalatiya 5:22-23]Murâ€™iyi minsi ibiri yo kwiyeza no kwisomora umururazi, umuntu wese yisuzume arabe yuko afise ivyamwa vya Mpwemu Yera muri we.

title: Ugusenga kugira ngo UhorahoÂ yitoranirize.
content:
GUSENGERA AMAHITAMWO.

Â«Â Barasenga, bati Mwami, ni wewe uzi imitima yâ€™abantu bose, none werekane uwo utoranije murâ€™ aba bompiÂ Â»[Ivyakozwe nâ€™intumwa 1:24]

Aha ni intumwa zariko zirasenga zisaba Imana izirongore muguhitamwo uwosubirira Yuda kuko yari yariyahuye inyuma yo kugurisha Yesu. Hagati ya Matiya na Yusito, bashaka umwe kuko niwe yarâ€™akenewe ngwâ€™amusubirire mugishingo. Basenze bavuga bati Mana, niwewe uzi imitima yâ€™aba bantu bose,â€¦

Burya uko umuntu akura, hari igihe bimusaba amahitamwo amwe nâ€™amwe kandi akomeye, nko guhitamwo uwo muzobana, canke kubakozi bâ€™Imana guhitamwo abo batoranya muguhagararira umurimo,guhitamwo incutiâ€¦

Isengesho rikwiriye, ni irivuga ngo Mana, ni wewe uzi imitima yâ€™aba bantu. Muyindi mvugo,muguhitamwo,umuntu wakagomvye guhera kumutima wâ€™umuntu. Kuko umutima wâ€™uwundi utaba uwuzi ijana kwâ€™ijana, niho usenga ngo Imana ikurongore.Ariko benshi bahera kubigaragarira amaso.

Umusi samweli Imana yamutuma kugenda kurobanuza amavuta uwuzoba umwami, yihenze kukaranga ka bakuru ba Dawidi, yibwira ko ari muri bo Imana yatoranije. Na se wa Dawidi nawe kuko yaraba ibigaragarira amaso, ataraba umutima, yabihenzeko, yibaza ko ari muri bo. Dawidi arirengagizwa, kandi ariwe yarâ€™afise umutima Imana ishaka.

Imana yaje kubwira samweli atiâ€¦kuko jewe sindaba nkâ€™uko abantu baraba, kuko jewe ndaba umutima.Vyarangiye uwufise umutima Imana ishaka(Dawidi) ariwe atoranijwe.

Benedata, ibindi vyose birihuta gutituka, uretse umutima gusa. Ntidukwiye kuraba dufatiye kubigaragara inyuma gusa, ngo biduhume amaso bitubuze kubaza Imana izi imitima yâ€™abantu bose.

Imana izi imitima izokurongorera ahakwiriye, kandi ntuze wite cane kuvyo abantu baraba ibigaragarira amaso bavuga, nimba uzoba wasenze ukumva ko koko urongowe nâ€™Imana.

Kandi amahitamwo benâ€™aya uzoyasanga mumice hafi yose yâ€™ubuzima:Muguhitamwo abagenzi, canke uwo muzokwubakana,muguhitamwo akazi(mugihe ubona imiryango yugurutse ari myinshi),muguhitamwo abatoranywa mumurimo wâ€™Imana,â€¦

Mugihe câ€™amahitamwo, dukwiye kwirinda guhitamwo turabiye kubigaraga amaso gusa, kuko burya uko igihe kihaca umutima wâ€™umuntu niyo shusho nziza yerekana ubwiza bwiwe. Igikuru nâ€™umutima rero, ibindi umuntu yobiraba,ariko yahereye kumutima, agasenga kugira ngo Imana izi imitima yâ€™abantu imurongore,kuko hatabayeho gusenga nâ€™uwo mutima nyene umuntu yowihendako.

title: Nta kintu na kimwe cotuma wica abenegihugu ngo uriko uharanira agatekaÂ kawe.
content:
Umuhari Red Tabara waraye wihaye inkumbi hafi yâ€™igisagara ca Bujumbura aho wishe umuryango wose uri mu kigandaro. Abarundi baratera igihugu cabo bakica benewabo ngo barondera ibiganiro na leta!

Abarundi baramenyereye kwumva amasasu nâ€™ibisasu bisamirana ku mbibe zâ€™igihugu maze bukeye bagasanga ni abenegihugu m: abana, abagore, abagabo abatama nâ€™abatamakazi bahasize ubuzima kumbure hakiyongerako umwe canke babiri mu bajejwe umutekano bahasize ubuzima.Abantu begereye ahariko harabera ubgo bgicanyi baca batanga amakuru ku mbuga ngurukana majambo bariko baritabariza, abakoresha imbuga nabo bagaca babihanahana maze umwe wese akagira ico abivuzeko. Kubera ubgo bubisha buba mwâ€™ijoro, Leta yâ€™Uburundi ica izindukira gutanga itangazo yâ€™ivyaraye bibaye bagasa nâ€™abatanguranwa nâ€™itangazo ryabo bakoze ibara ku rubuga rwabo.Ivyaraye bibaye buringa bisa nâ€™ivyabaye mu gatumba bigasa nâ€™ivyabaye ku ruhagarika bigasa nâ€™ivyabaye naâ€™ahandi hose aho abo batera bitrara mu bantu batobato kugira ngo ivyo bakora bivugwe cane. I Buringa baraye bishe abantu icenda bari basanzwe bari mu kigandaro baturira nâ€™imodoka irimwo ikizoga bariko baritegurira kujana mu buruhukiro. Ivyo bakabikorera rimwe no gutera ku ngoro yâ€™umugambge uri ku butegetsi aho bayiteye ibisasu barayisenyura igihande kitari gito. Ivyo nti biboneka nkâ€™ibikorwa vyo kurwanira ubutegetsi mugabo ukuburwanya bifatanije nâ€™ubugizi bga nabi.Uretse abantu basanzwe barwanya leta yâ€™Uburundi baca, umwe wese yandika ibimujemwo kubera umunezero wâ€™abakunda agapfa, hariho nâ€™abandi bagerageza kwiyumvira ingene umutekano wâ€™igihugu wokomezwa nâ€™abajejwe umutekano canecane kugira ngo abenegihugu nâ€™abajejwe intwaro nabo babafashe mu kubabera ijisho. Ivyo, bose ntibabitahura kumwe.Abo bavuga ngo umutekano guhungabana ni ibisanzwe, ngo no muri Amerika, Ubulaya nâ€™uburusiya urahungababa, ni bareke kungereranya ibitangereranwa. Ubwambere nuko basa nukubona ko ibibera iwacu ari ibisanzwe ngo muri AmÃ©rika birabaho. Ninkaho wokwijajara ngo ntaco ibibera muri Congo nâ€™ibisanzwe kubera no muri Gaza canke muri Ukraine biriko biraberayo. Nico kimwe nâ€™abumva uvuze uti inzego zâ€™umutekano ni zikomeze urugamba ugaca uvuga ngo nawe ingo wote umuriro urare kwâ€™ijoro. Ivyiyumviro nkivyo sivyo. Twese ntitwoba abasoda kandi ntitwoba ba mbangamatwi. Bamwe bose nâ€™ivyo bajejwe.Ikindi abantu bomenya nuko ubwicanyi bwo muri AmÃ©rika, ikibutera si kimwe nâ€™iwacu. Iwacu ni ivya politke. Nâ€™uguhungabanya umutekano wâ€™igihungu kumvo za politike nkâ€™uko bavyanditse mwâ€™itangazo ryabo ngo bagomba ibiganiro vya bose kandi binshingiye ku masezerano ya Arusha. Abashinzwe ico gisata babihemberwa bariho bakwiriye gukora neza gusumba. Muri Amerika abakoze ikibi baramenyekana bagahanwa. Uwo badashoboye kuronka bamusanga iyari. Wosingura gute kâ€™ivyabereye mu Ruhangarika, ibombe yatewe kuri ca kiraro i Bubanza, hamwe kuri ya antenne ibintu biguma vyisubiza !Abantu biyumvira nkâ€™uko ni baba bakora mu baducungiye umutekano, nibo bakora nabi. Abasoda, abapolisi, abashinzwe umutekano badakwiriye barongerezwa. Unsigura gute ko abantu baza i Gihanga bakarasa bakisubirira muri Congo atankomazi (sinzi ko uzi ikirere gihari) !Mu bisanzwe ikibazo câ€™umutekano wâ€™igihugu ni ica bose mugabo abasirikare nâ€™abapolisi nibo baja imbere gusumba abandi bose. Ingorane zihari ni ingene ihanga ryâ€™abarundi ritunganijwe murâ€™ibi bihe kubera amoko, imigambge nâ€™ubutunzi. Abahunze igihugu barafise uko babona ikibazo câ€™umutekano wâ€™igihugu, abari mu gihugu nabo nyene barafise uko bamwe nâ€™abandi babona umutekano wâ€™igihugu bivanye nâ€™imigambge barimwo, akazi bakora, amoko yabo, ubutunzi uko bgifashe nâ€™ivyo bagiye barigishwa. Iyo mihari itera hari naho bibaza yuko itera ivuye hanze yâ€™igihugu mugabo atariko vyama bimeze kuko hariho nâ€™abari mu nzego zâ€™umutekano wâ€™igihugu batanezererewe ubutegetsi bgâ€™igihugu ivyo bikaba vyotuma bakora ibikorwa vyâ€™umwansi canke bakifatanya nawe. Uburundi burakwiriye gusubira kuvugurugwa mu vyerekeye les structures sociales na le renforcement de la capacite securitaire.

title: Amahoro araronderwa kandi arakorerwa. Abera nibo bategerezwaÂ kuyateramira!
content:
kurondera amahoro.

Â» aburamu abarira loti, ati ndakwinginze, hoye kuba intonganya hagati yanje nawe, no hagati yâ€™abungere banje nâ€™abawe, kuko tuvukana. eregâ€™ igihugu cose kirâ€™ imbere yawe! ndakwinginze ngo duhane intara, ni wahitamwo kuja i bumoso nanje ndaja i buryo; ni waja i buryo ndaja i bumoso.Â Â»[Itanguriro 13:8-9]

Aha Imana ntiyari bwahindurire izina Abiramu, ngo abe Aburahamu, be na Loti barabana, kuko yari yajanye nawe igihe Imana yahamagara aburahamu. Igihugu bari bagerereyemwo nticabakwira kuko bari bafise amasho menshi. Haca haba ugutongana hagati yâ€™abungere babaragirira. Abiramu niko kumubgira ati ahitemwo aho abona ko ari heza kuri we, nawe araja ahazoba hasigaye, kandi niko vyagenze.

Burya amahoro ntiyizana,umuntu arayaharanira. Harâ€™abantu mutopfa mwumvikanye, ngo mubane neza, atari wewe ubihisemwo. No gutongana bumva ataco bibabwiye. Aburahamu rero niko guhitishamwo Loti umwishwa wiwe ngo ahitemwo aho abona ko ari heza, we araja ahazoba hasigaye. Mu yindi mvugo,yaramuhebeye.

Kugira bikunde tubane amahoro nâ€™abandi biradusaba kwiga kubahebera. Ushobora kureka umuntu akibwira ko ivyo ariko arakubwira arivyo, kuko ubona atiteguye gutsindwa, ivyo navyo akaba atakindi vyozana atari ugutongana. Ukagira amahoro mu gihe ataco vyica.

Iciza co kuba umunyamahoro nâ€™uko bizana umugisha. Loti niwe yahisemwo heza, ariko imana yarahezagiye Abiramu kumurusha.Bibiliya niyo ivuga ngo umugisha w Uhoraho uratungisha kandi ntamubabaro awuvangamwo.

Abantu bashobora kwibaza ko bariko baragutsinda, muvyo bavuga, baronka,â€¦nawe ko uriko utera uja inyuma, ariko burya hari amahirwe agendana nâ€™abantu barondera amahoro. Nâ€™umugisha w Uhoraho utungisha,sâ€™ugutongana. Ibi ntibisigura ko ukwiye kureka abantu bakakunyaga utwawe, bisigura gusa ko uca munzira yâ€™amahoro kugira ugere aho ushaka.

Benshi baba mu mitongano nâ€™abo bita abâ€™iwabo, abantu babo ba hafi kuko gusa batarahitamwo umwanzuro nkâ€™uyu wa aburamu, wo kurondera amahoro. Bahora bagomba gutsinda impari, kwerekana ko ivyo bavuga arivyo, bagahora mu cuka kibi babihiwe, kuko abo bafitaniye ibibazo nâ€™abo batiteguye kurondera amahoro.

Nimba kurondera amahoro kwawe bizogusaba kwivugira make, uzobikore.ico vyogusaba cose,uzogikore.amaherezo uzosanga ari wewe wahisemwo neza, kuko ntaciza kiva mugitongana, kandi nâ€™Imana izobana nawe.Mwige kubana neza nâ€™abantu bose kandi mwame murondera kugiranira amahoro nâ€™abantu bose.

title: Umuntu wese arafise uruhara mwâ€™ishitswa ryâ€™umugambi bâ€™Imana kuÂ bantu.
content:
URUHARA RWâ€™UMUNTU MUMUGAMBI Wâ€™IMANA.

Â«Â Bamaze kugenda, umumarayika wâ€™Umwami Imana yiyerekera Yosefu mu nzozi, aramubgira, ati Vyuka, ujane umwana na nyina, uhungire muri Egiputa, ugumeyo gushitsa aho nzokubaririra, kuko Herode agira arondere umwana ngw amwice.Â Â»[Matayo 2:13]

Aha Yesu yari yavutse, Umwami Herode nawe agira imigabo yo kumwica. Imana ica ibihishurira Yosefu ngo ahungishe umwana na nyina.

Akenshi hari igihe dusenga ariko tukibagira uruhara rwacu mumugambi wâ€™Imana. Hano vyasaba uruhara rwa Yosefu kugira ngo umwana ahungishwe,arokoke.

Igihe dusenze ibihwanye nâ€™ivyo Imana ishaka, yo iba yiteguye gukora ariko hari igihe bisaba uruhara rwanje nawe mu mugambi wayo.

Ushobora gusengera ikanguro ariko Imana ikarindira ngo uruhara rwawe rugaragare(nko kubwira abandi ivya Yesu gushigikira abajanabutumwa,kurungikira abandi ijambo ryâ€™Imana,â€¦).

Canke ugasenga ngo Imana ihindure abâ€™iwanyu batarihana ariko ingeso zawe nazo zizobigiramwo uruhara.

Habe no mwâ€™iterambere ryo kugiti cawe, Imana izotuma uruhara rwawe rugaragara kuko hari inyifato umuntu ayifise adashobora kugira aho yigejeje(nko gusesagura,â€¦)

No mumigenderanire yawe nâ€™abandi, Imana izotuma uruhara rwawe rubamwo, nko kumenya kubaha agaciro, kubaganiriza ivyubaka,â€¦

Imana idufitiye imigambi myinshi ariko hategerezwa kugaragaramwo uruhara rwacu. Niwasenga ngo Imana iguhindure igikoresho cayo umenye ko uruhara rwawe ari ukwitoza kubaho ubuzima bwâ€™amasengesho,bwirinda,â€¦

Dukwiye kumenya rero ko Imana ari umufatanyabikorwa natwebwe, tugakora ivyo uruhara rwacu rudusaba nayo izoshitsa uruhara rwayo. Tube abantu bubaha Imana nâ€™abakozi bâ€™abahizi muri vyose.

title: Amabanga ya satani yamenetse niwe azibira imigishaÂ yâ€™igihugu.
content:
AMABANGA Yâ€™IBITUMA AMASEZERANO ATANGIRWA NTASHIKEUmuntu akorana nâ€™ubushobozi bgâ€™ikuzimu, asanzwe akorera mu bihugu cumi nâ€™umunani vyo kwâ€™isi, vyamwanse munda kubera ibibi amaze gukorera abasenga araheza aserura amabanga yâ€™ivyo bakora atuma amasezerano yâ€™Abarundi ateba kwambara umubiri agashitswa. Burya abantu bakorana na satani baragisibije. Abo baja mu bgami bgâ€™ikuzimu bakarondera ubushobozi bgo kuganza abantu baremwe nâ€™Imana bakoresheje amangetengete. Kugira ngo batirwe murâ€™ico kibi, babanza gutanga ibimazi vyâ€™abantu bâ€™incuti, abo bakunda canke bagatanga abo bose babona yuko bafise umutima wokuzokorera Imana. Benshi mu bantu badakingiwe murâ€™iyo mirwi barahaguye abandi bari mu ngorane zâ€™urutabanako.Inyigisho zâ€™amadini nâ€™amashengero nyinshi zanyegeje abizera babo yuko ikuzimu habaho. Benshi ntibabugurura amaso ngo bamenye yuko hariho ubgami tubangabanganye.Nkâ€™uko hariho ubgami bgâ€™Imana,nako hariho nâ€™ubgami bga satani nkuko hariho ubgami bgâ€™abantu mu gihugu. Ubgami bga satani ni ukuri kwamye, abantu barabujamwo bakagaruka, hari nâ€™abaherayo. Hariho abajayo nâ€™umuburi nâ€™abajayo mu mpwemu. Igihambaye nâ€™uko abantu bomenya yuko Imana yahaye abaremwe ubushobozi ku bgami bga satani. Yagize ati : Â« Kumenya Yesu Kristo ni amahirwe ugirirwa nâ€™Uhoraho Imana. Ku bimeya nirwo rutare Yesu Kristo yubakiyeko ishengero ryiwe kandi nâ€™amarembo yâ€™IKUZIMU ntazorishobora. Ababizi yabahaye urupfunguzo rwâ€™ubgami bgo mwâ€™ijuru. Ico bazohambira mwâ€™isi kizoba gihambiriwe no mwâ€™ijuru, nâ€™ico bazohamburura mwâ€™isi kizoba gihamburuwe no mwâ€™ijuru. Â» [Matayo 16 : 13-20]Ivyo bihemu vyagotse kâ€™Uhoraho Imana bigakorana na satani vyacitse inkozi zâ€™ikibi mwâ€™isi yâ€™abazima. Usanga barondera ubushobozi bgâ€™ikuzimu nâ€™amangetengete kugira ngo bagundishe ububasha bgâ€™abadayimoni abantu kugira ngo babaganze. Abo rero ubasanga mu baganza ibihugu, abaganza mu ntwaro nâ€™izindi nzego zâ€™igihugu. Igitangaje nâ€™uko nâ€™abakuru bâ€™amadini nâ€™amashengero nabo nyene naho usanga bavuga Â« imana Â» bakoresha ayo mangetengete kugira ngo bagunde abizera bongere baganze abasenga bose. Abafatwa nâ€™izo mpwemu zihumanye ni badakijijwe neza ngo bagiranire imigenderanire nâ€™Umwami nâ€™Umukiza Yesu Kristo kugira ngo abambike icubahiro câ€™ubudahangarwa bga Mpwemu Yera. Murâ€™abo nyene bakoresha imbaraga zâ€™umwiza, harimwo abari ku rundi rwego rwo hejuru mu gukorera ibibi umuntu wese agomba kubaho ubuzima bgo kwubaha Imana butagira icaha. Babateza ingwara, ubukene, inzara, ubugumba, imiryano mu miryango, ukubengwa, impanuka, kubura akazi, ukwankwa nâ€™abantu, inyatsi nâ€™ayandi makuba menshi asanzwe ashikira abantu bintungane munsi yâ€™izuba. [Yohana 10 :10]

Ivyo bikoresho vya satani, ni abantu baba bishikira i Kuzimu canke bagatuma abandi babashikirayo. Usanga bari mu baganza mu gihugu no mwâ€™ishengero. Abo nyene bari mu ntwaro yâ€™igihugu, mu madini nâ€™amashengero nibo bagerageje kuboha, kuzibira no kuburizamwo amasezerano yâ€™igihugu câ€™Uburundi. Bakora ijoro nâ€™umurango kugira ngo bayugare, maze amaso yâ€™abayarindiriye azohere mu nzira. Abo bangushi nyene mu kugwanya ayo masezerano Uhoraho yahaye igihugu câ€™Uburundi bakoresha inzira zo kurwanya abanyakarago, bagakoresha nâ€™ubuhinga bgo kuyibagiza abantu kugira ngo ntibayasengere. Impwemu za satani nizo zahagurukije abakungu nâ€™abatungu, imbundege nâ€™abishira hejuru bâ€™intakebga zikiyimika ziyitirira ayo masezerano kugira ngo abantu babe mu rujijo no kuzazanirwa maze bayazinukwe. Nta yinzi nzira wocamwo ngo ubarwanye atari mu masengesho yâ€™inkomezi. [Abanyefeso 6:10-20]Uwo yari mu bakoresho vya satani yariko arabohoka yameneye satani amabanga menshi ayabarira abo yariko arasaba imbabazi bo mwâ€™Ihanga Ryera ryâ€™Imana. Yavuze ibikorwa vyâ€™ububisha abo bantu tubona bagendagenda bambaye umubiri nkatwe mugabo bafise impwemu zo mwâ€™isi yâ€™umwijima bakorera abantu bâ€™inyama nâ€™amaraso. Kubera abaganza mu gihugu no mwâ€™Ishengero bagararije Uhoraho Imana, nico gituma muzobona harimwo abapfa impfu zidasobanutse kandi ngo nâ€™inkota yâ€™Imana izobasanga ku kazi canke mu masengero bariko barasenga ibarandure. Impfu mwumva canke muzobona zose ntimuzozegeke kuri satani kuko Uhoraho Imana arahana atakigongwe iyo yaburiye abantu bakanka kwumva bakamugarariza. Ivyo yarabisezeranye. [Yesaya 13:11]Uwo mu shehe yongeyeko ati aha mubona abantu benshi bagenda barayinze kuko bashegeshwe nâ€™ibibi bibashikira kubera ivyo bikoresho vyâ€™ikuzimu biri mu baganza, mu madini nâ€™amashengero mugabo abantu ntibabimenye. Batuma abantu gukora ibisesema imbere yâ€™Uhoraho vyose. Yagize ati ivyo mwomenya yuko:

title: Muri umunyu dâ€™Isi kandi mutegerezwa kugumana uburyohe nâ€™akanovera mu bikorwa no muÂ ngeso.
content:
TWAHAMAGARIWE KUBA UMUNYU Wâ€™ISI.

Â«Â Umunyu ni mwiza, arikâ€™ umunyu woshira uburyohe, mwoba mukiwuryohesha iki? Mugire umunyu mu mitima yanyu, kandi mubane amahoro.Â Â»[Mariko 9:50]

Umunyu uraryosha inrya, ndetse abenshi vyonabagora gufungura ivyo kurya utabirimwo. Ni nako umu Kristo iyo ari umunyu koko nkâ€™uko bibiliya ivuga, ibintu birushiriza kuba ibiryoshe aho aherereye.

Nkâ€™akarorero, abantu benshi bakorera ijisho. Iyo uri umu Kristo murâ€™abo bantu, ukora ibintu neza, umukoresha wawe yakubona canke ntakubone, kuko uba ugambiriye gushimisha Imana.

Ushobora kwihanganira abantu kubwâ€™agakiza wakiriye. Ushobora guhezagira abantu kandi kuko Imana yabigushize ku mutima, atarâ€™uko ubufisemwo izindi nyungu zindi. Ushobora no kwigira uworoheje kandi bose bakwubaha, ivyo ntubishireko umutima. Ivyo hamwe nâ€™ibindi vyinshi nâ€™ivyo bituma tuzana uburyohe aho tubaye.

Ariko rero, Yesu yabajije ati Â«Â umunyu woshira uburyohe, mwoba mu kiwuryoshesha ik?Â Â»

Harya umu Kristo azi ijambo ryâ€™Imana, yakiriye Yesu, atakaje ivyamwa agasa nâ€™isi, yoba akiryoheshwa nâ€™iki?Nâ€™ivyo Imana yoshobora kumuhindura, ariko Imana ntihindura uwutayemereye.

Umukristo atari umunyu, ivyâ€™agakiza biramubihira, kandi aba nâ€™igitsitaza kubari mu mwiza bipfuza gukurikira Imana.

Nico gituma intego yacu nyamukuru nkâ€™abizera, ari ugusa na Yesu, kwama ivyamwa bikwiranye nâ€™agakiza twakiriye, kandi nivyo bikenewe kugira ngo duhagararire Imana neza mwâ€™isi kuko nico twashiriweho.

title: Menya Ijambo ryâ€™Imana kandi wuzure MpwemuÂ Yera.
content:
KUMENYA IJAMBO RYâ€™IMANA NO KUZURA MPWEMU YERA.

Â«Â Umurwanizi aramubgira, ati Ni waba urâ€™ Umwana wâ€™Imana, bgira iri buye ricike umutsima. Yesu aramwishura, ati Vyanditswe ngâ€™ Umuntu ntatungwa nâ€™umutsima gusa.Â Â»[Luka 4:3-4]

Abantu benshi barazi ijambo ryâ€™Imana, kandi nivyiza, ariko ntibikwiye kugarukira ku kuri Menya gusa,ahubwodukwiye gusenga Imana ikadushitsa ku yindi ntambwe yo kwuzuzwa Mpwemu Yera.

Usomye haruguru yâ€™uyu murongo, handitswe ngo Yesu yuzuzwa mpwemu yera,â€¦,agendagendeshwa mubugararwa na Mpwemu,â€¦Â Â»luka 4:1â€³.

Kumenya ijambo ryâ€™Imana birafasha, ariko mugihe utuzuzwa mpwemu Yera ntakinini rimara, kuko niwe agushoboza gushira mubikorwa ico iryo jambo rikubwira.

Bibiliya ni nka ya mazubagurishirizamwo imiti (pharmacie). Iyo urwaye, ntupfa kunywa umuti uwariwo wose ubonye, ahubwo unywa uwuhwanye nâ€™ingwara urwaye. Ariko uwo muti uwuhabwa nâ€™uwuyitanga, si wewe uwiha. Niko no muri bibiliya bimeze. Haba hari ijambo rikugenewe ako kanya kandi buri musi. Ariko siwewe uryiha , urihabwa na Mpwemu yera arikurongorerako.

Nico gituma umwe asoma bibiliya agahembuka, uwundi we akumva ntaco bibiliya imufasha mubibazo abamwo. Aba asa nâ€™uwafashe umuti uvura ikiguma kandi arwaye amaso. Uwo muti ntaco uheza ngo umare. Kandi iyo uwo muti uwuhawe nâ€™uwategerezwa kuwuguha, aguha uwuhwanye nâ€™ingwara urwaye. Niko na Mpwemu aguha ijambo rihwanye nâ€™ubukene bwâ€™umutima wawe.

Ikindi gituma dukeneye Mpwemu yera muguhabwa ijambo, nâ€™uko burya Imana ishobora guhishura vyinshi kwâ€™ijambo rimwe gusa usomye.

Rero, iyo uzi ijambo, ukaba ufise na Mpwemu yera , biroroshe cane kumenya ijwi ryâ€™Imana nirya satani ndetse nâ€™iryiwawe ubwawe.

Mpwemu yera niyavuga uzokwumva wuzuye amahoro, kuko kimwe muvyamwa vya Mpwemu yera harimwo amahoro, kandi kuko uzi ijambo ryâ€™Imana uzoca ubigenzuza ijambo. Ibi birafasha cane iyo uri umuvugabutumwa,kuko wiyumvisemwo ijambo ukumva nâ€™amahoro, uca umenya ko ari ijambo Imana igeneye ubwoko bwayo. Kikaba ikibazo iyo wahawe kugabura ijambo ryâ€™Imana, ariko ukaba udafitaniye ubusabane na Mpwemu ngo aguhe kwiyumvamwo ivyo intama zikenera biciye mu mahoro yâ€™umutima. Akenshi biterwa nâ€™uko umuntu atakironka akanya ko gusenga.

Ninaco gituma bidakunda ko umuntu uwariwe wese abaho yuzuye Mpwemu mugihe atari umuntu akunda gusenga. Ashobora kumenya ijambo nivyo, ariko kwuzura mpwemu yera vyo umuntu abihabwa nâ€™umwanya amara imbere yâ€™Imana.

Iyo umukristo rero azi ijambo ryâ€™Imana, akaba yuzuye na Mpwemu yera,usivye ko yama nâ€™ivyamwa vyiza nkâ€™abana bâ€™Imana, anamenya nâ€™imigambi yâ€™Imana ku buzima bwiwe, kandi na satani ntapfa kumuhangara uko abishatse, kuko benâ€™uyo aba afise ikirwanishwa bishobora kumufasha gukomeza urugendo, kandi adaciwe intege nâ€™umwansi.Wameusoma ijamboryâ€™Imanakugira ngo rirwire muri wewe kandi wame wumvira nâ€™ijwi rya Mpwemu Yera kugira ngo akurongore.

title: Nyamugigima yumvikanye ku muhingamo mu gisagara caÂ Bujumbura.
content:
Hari ku masaha yo kumurongo aho nyamugigima yumvikanye ku masaha yo ku murango. Hariho abatayumvise mu gisagara hagati kubera bari mu rwamo rwinshi, mugabo abandi bayumvise kandi bibatera ubgoba.

Iyo nkuru yâ€™iyo nyamugigima yaciye ihanahanwa nâ€™abarundi iyo bari kwâ€™isi hose bamwe bamwe bahora baca bayifatanya nâ€™ivyo bizera bavuga yuko bagendereje canke nâ€™ivyo bipfuza. Ije ikurikirana nâ€™imvura ivanze nâ€™umuyaga yahitanye abantu bariko barasenga ku munsi wâ€™Imana uheruka aho bamwe bapfuye abandi barakomereka mu ntara za Cibitoke, Ngozi na Rutana.

Haciye ahanya gato ukwo kunyiganyiga kwâ€™isi kwumvikanye mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, haciye hakwiravizwa ifoto ryâ€™ibarabara ryacitse bavuga yuko ari i Nyanzalac bavuga yuko ari iyo nyamugigima yarisituye. Mugabo abazi gusesangura bavuze yuko iryo barabara atari mu Burundi mugabo yuko ari ishusho yo muri Ghana. Abari i Nyanza lac bemeje yuko ari ahitwa i Mukungu muri Nyanza Lac bemeza yuko atari imbeshere.

Abarundi dukomeze gusenga ubugombe bgâ€™Imana abe aribgo buba ku gihugu cacu, ibiva kuri satani vyose bisendwe mwâ€™izina rya Yesu Kristo.

title: Ukutizera ukivumbura bishobora ku guhushisha umugisha wawe. GiraÂ kwumvira.
content:
KWIVUMBURA BIBUZA UMUGISHA.

Â» Elisa araheza amutumako, uti Genda wiyuhagire muri yorodani ibihetangabo ndwi, umubiri uraca usubira uko wahora, nawe uzoba uhumanutse. Ariko Namani aca araraka, arivumbura, ati Nahoze ngira ngw arasohoka ahagarare, atakambire izina ryâ€™Uhoraho Imana yiwe, azungagize ukuboko hejuru yâ€™aho ndwaye, ankize imibembe. Mbegâ€™ inzuzi zâ€™i Damasiko, Abana na Farupari, ntiziruta amazi yose yâ€™i Bgisirayeli? Sinoshobora kuziyuhagiramwo ngahumanuka? Nukw arahindukira, agenda aratse.Â Â»[2Abami 5:10-12]

Iyi nkuru ivuga kumugabisha wâ€™ingabo zâ€™abasiriya yari yagiye kwa Elisa ngo amusengere akire imibembe.Ariko alisa aca amutumako ati genda wiyuhagire muri Yorodani ibihetangabo ndwi, urahumanuka.Nawe aca araraka, arivumbura,kuko yari yiteze ko aza kwakirwa mucubahiro, Elisa akamusengera hanyuma agakira. Imana ishimwe kuko abagendanyi biwe bahavuye bamuhanura gukora ivyo yabwiwe na Elisa, arabumvira,hanyuma aca arahumanuka, akira imibembe.

Kwivumbura ni ikintu kibi, kandi birabuza umugisha.Akenshi biva ko umuntu ataba afashwe uko yarâ€™avyiteze (nkâ€™uko vyashikiye uyu mugabisha), agaca ahitamwo kuva mukibanza Imana imushakamwo. I aze,uyu mugabisha yarâ€™agiye gusubirana inyuma ingwara yimibembe, yari imusesereje igatuma nâ€™abantu bamubonako agasembwa, kubera gusa yanse kuja kwibira muri Yorodani incuro ndwi.

Burya iyo utahuye imibembe yawe (intege nke zawe), ntikiba kikiri ikibazo câ€™icubahiro cawe kugira ngo ukire. Nico gituma Imana ikoresha abantu bato, mukukurangira inzira ukwiye gufata. Ariko rero abenshi iyo nzira barayanka,bakivumbura.

Uzoca usanga benshi bacira imanza mu mitima yabo abo Imana ikoresha, kandi ariyo nzira iba yahisemwo mukubakiza imibembe(mukubkiza intege nke zabo). Ngo yize amashure angahe, none wewe ivyo avuga arabikora, ngo nâ€™abana baramunaniye,â€¦iyo ikaba impamvu ituma badashira umutima kunzira nziza bariko barerekwa.

Kwivumbura vyama bibuza umugisha imisi yose. Umugore bita Ana niwe yavyifashemwo neza. Yagiye mu rusengero kuririra Imana ngo imuhe umwana. Umuherezi bita Eli aca yibaza ko yaborewe, aca amubwira ngo uzogeza ryari kwama uborewe, genda uhebe vino yawe. Hana ntiyaciye yivumbura, ahubwo yaciye amubwirakoâ€¦ yaje gusuka amajojwa yiwe imbere yâ€™Uhoraho. Umuherezi Eli aca amuhesha umugisha, ati Uhoraho aguhe ivyo wamusavye. Kandi niko vyabaye Ana ntivyatevye aca asama inda, avyara Samweli.Kwivumbura kwa Ana vyari gushobora kumubuza umugisha, agapfa ataronse akana.

Benshi bataye insengero basengeramwo,gusa ngo nâ€™uko badafashwe uku canke kuriya. Umuntu akava mukibanza Imana yomuhereyemwo umugisha, gusa ngo nâ€™uko afise umurongozi batumvikana,â€¦abandi bagata ubuzi, abandi bagahagarika gukorera mungabire zabo,â€¦

Umukristo ari murugendo, akwiye kurengera impamvu yose yotuma yivumbura,kuko bibuza umugisha. Mwenedata wese akwiye kugera kurugero aho akora ico Imana ishaka ko akora, niyo womenga ntibimwubahisha imbere yâ€™abantu, niyo womenga abitumwe nabo aruta mucubahiro, cankemubwenge, kuko kwivumbura nta Mugisha ubamwo.Igihecoseuzumva ijwiryâ€™Imanantukidodombe canke ngo wivumbure ngo yari gukora ibi canke biriya. Imana ikora uko igomba, wewe gira ukwizera no kwubaha ijwi ryayo gusa uzoca wishurwa kuko inzira zâ€™Imana zirenga igihumbi.

title: Â«Â Agatikizo nkako karabashitsemwo BarundiÂ Â» Umuvugishwa wâ€™UmurundikaziÂ yabonekewe.
content:
Tumaze imyaka irenga icumi twigisha Ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi amasezerano Imana yahaye ihanga ryâ€™Abarundi. Abavugishwa batandukanye baravugishijwe ibintu biteye ubgoba kandi vyose vyarashitse nkâ€™uko vyari vyavugishijwe.

Aha twobabarira nkâ€™ivyerekeye (1) imyiyerekano yo mu 2015 nâ€™igerageza gutembabagaza ubutegetsi bga Petero Nkurunziza, (2) Urupfu rwa Petero Nkurunziza, (3) Ubukene, ubusuma, inzara, akarenganyo nâ€™ubutegetsi butorohereza abeneguhugu inyuma yâ€™intwaro ya Petero Nkurunziza, (4) Intambara ya Congo izohitana nâ€™abasirikare bâ€™Abarundi, (6)Iyicwa ryâ€™abari mu rusengero nâ€™isenyuka ryâ€™amasengero ya PentecÃ´te nâ€™ayandi nka za Ezeubu, (7) Inkota yâ€™Imanaigiye guca mu gihugu câ€™Uburundiâ€¦

Murâ€™iyâ€™indwi twatanguye, abahanuzi bâ€™Abarundi bashika icumi bazwi neza kandi batazinayi babariwe yuko kubera abantu bagararije Imana haje intambara kandi zizomara abantu mu gihugu no mwâ€™ishengero.

Uwambere ari gusenga mu mpere yâ€™indwi irangiye, yumvise umuntu ariko arasemerera avuga ngo ngahongaho NTEGA/MARANGARA iratanguye.

Uwugira kabiri yubonye umuntu yambaye impuzu zera amubarira ati hagiye gutera intureka mu gihugu câ€™Uburundi kandi zizohitana Abantu benshi, ngo musenge cane abantu bihane.

Uwagatatu yumvise ijwi rivuga ngo ifirufumbi rirabaye mu Burundi kuko isezerano rirashitse ngo ehe ubutigu burageze.

Nâ€™abandi benshi beretswe ivyerekeye ibihe biri imbere vyâ€™intambara, abantu bicwa kandi batagira iyo bahungira, umwe wese yicwa na mugenziwe,â€¦

Uwo mupfasoni nawe wo mwâ€™ishengero rya pentecote yeretwse ivyerekeye intambara nâ€™iyicwa ryâ€™abanyamadini kubera bazanye isi mwâ€™ishengero.

Usanga wizera ivyerekeye yuko Imana ivuga kandi bigashika, tugusabe witegurire ibihe biri imbere mu mutima, mu Mpwemu no mu mubiri kuko biraje. Nta jambo ryavuzwe nâ€™Imana ngo rigende uko. Kuri wewe utavyizera, uranzkumbura uvyizere kuko twe twarabivendereje kandi twarabibonye yuko ari ukuri. Urashobora kuba utabibona ubu mugabo vuba uzobibona, rero ntuze wicuze. Itegure!

title: Ukuri ukuvanze nâ€™ikinyoma gucika ikinyoma kandi nâ€™ukuri ukuvuze igice kuba ubusa. Abarundi barakinishaÂ umuriro.
content:
Nahisemwo gukebura Abarundi bakoresha imbuga ngurukana majambo bitwaje yuko barwanya ubutegetsi canke babushigikiye maze bagasuka umuriro mu bantu bibaza yuko ari ibisanzwe. Inkuba irabije ntuvuga ngo mara Abansi kuko nâ€™abakunzi irajaniranya. Hari vyinshi vyandikwa nâ€™aba nâ€™abariya bamwe bagiriza abo muri leta ukwica abantu abandi bagiriza abarwanya leta ukwicisha abantu. Mugabo uyu munsi ntituzindukanywe no kubeshuza uyu nâ€™uriya canke kuvugira leta ariko duhamagarira umurundi wese kudahendwa ngo abure itiro canke ngo ahige kwihora mugenziwe muvuka gihugu kubera ibinyoma nâ€™urwanko bikwiragizwa nâ€™abandika canke bifata amajwi bakabisuka ku mbuga ngurukana bumenyi.

Uyu munsi hariho abantu bariko batuma imiryango irara idasinziriye mu gukwiragiza yuko Leta yâ€™Uburundi yakuye uburozi mu gihugu câ€™Uburusiya kugira ngo yice naka na naka bari ku ntonde yâ€™abarwanya leta abari mu gihugu nâ€™abari hanze. Jewe sindi umuvugizi wâ€™umuntu nâ€™umwe ariko nagomba kwerekana yuko ivyo bivugwa nâ€™abo bavuga babizi yuko ariIKINYOMA KIBISHE KANDI YUKO BARIKO BARIKURAKO AGASHAMBARA BO NYENE.

Abari ku butegetsi mu gihugu barashobora gukora ibishoboka vyose harimwo nâ€™ibibi bibishe kugira ngo bakingire ubutegetsi bahawe ariko mu migambi bakora ntiharimwo kugemurira uburozi Abarundi bahungiye mu mahanga canke abari hano mu gihugu kuko ntibarashika kurâ€™urwo rugero. Abahana ishano bararihana hagati yabo ariko ntibabiririra abahunze igihugu.

Uretse yuko abari ku butegetsi bafise abansi hagati yabo nyene birirwa barahigana, nta mwanya wo kuja kurondera uwutakiri mu Burundi canke Uwo badafise ico basangiye. Umwansi wâ€™ukuri nâ€™uyo mwirirwana azi uko uryama nâ€™uko uvyuka kandi agufitiye inzigo nâ€™umugambi wo kukugirira nabi. Uwuri kure aba ari kure nyenye.

Uretse yuko abarundi bazi kwicana bahanye ishano risanzwe riba ritekeye, canke bimwe bita indugwe yâ€™ingona, uburozi bukoreshwa nâ€™abarusiya busaba ubuhinga bginshi kuko ubutera umuntu canke ukabushira muvyo afungura canke anywa mbere bukanatumuka mu muyaga kuko na wewe ubumuhaye bukakwinjiramwo ku buryo wewe wabutanze uca ujanwa kuvuzwa imiti ihambaye itanaboneka iwacu kandi ku gihe kirekire kuko ubgo burozi buba bgakwinjiyemwo.

Ubgo burozi bavuga bukoreshwa nâ€™abantu bâ€™abahinga bavyize bakaminuza mu bihugu vyarutura kandi bakuwemwo ubuntu kuko baba bitangiye inzego zâ€™ubutasi bakavyigishwa kuva bakiri bato kandi bakamenya yuko bazorangiriza ubuzima bgabo murâ€™ivyo nyene. Ivyo mu Burundi ntabihari.

Abarundi ni batekane nta leta yâ€™Uburundi iriko irabarondeza uburozi mu gihugu canke mu mahanga. Imiryango nâ€™iryame isinzire irwane izindi ntambara. Iyo leta nâ€™iyigira imigambi yo kuza kubica izokoresha bga buhinga mwese mukoresha kuko murazi yuko namwe nkâ€™abarundi barundi mutoroshe muzi ingene ibibi bikorwa.

Abo bakwiragiza ivyo bihuha vyâ€™uburozi bo barazi ico bironderera aho mu bazungu, kwiyita yuko baronderwa bibaha kwimenyekanisha, guhabga ubufasha, kwikundwakaza ku bantu, kuronka ivyo barya batavunitse, kwitwa yuko bakunda Abarundi kandi bariko barabarwanira, no kurondera nâ€™ubundi burushosho bgâ€™abantu badafise inyuma yâ€™urugo. Mu Barundi co kimwe no mu banyamahanga hariho abantu bama babeshwaho canke bahimbarirwa no gucuruza urwanko mu bantu. Abo ntakindi bakora.

Iyo iciba nkico gihuha casutswe mu bantu, ingo zose , imigwi yose nâ€™imiryango yose ntakindi bavuga kuko bakigira ikibazo co gupfa no kuzuka. Benshi bumvise yuko hari umuntu batamenye yamye kubarondera bibaza yuko ari babarozi. Babonye umuntu batazi canke ikintu batamenyereye vyose bavyita bga burozi kuko abo bakwiragiza ibihuha nkâ€™ivyo barazi ahica. Barazi kugumura abantu gushika naho bokwisuka ku risongoye canke Abarundi bakamarana bishimikije amoko, imigambge canke aho baturuka.

Nkâ€™uko bakwiragije ubgoba mu bantu ngo leta irabumviriza ku matelefone iyo bahungiye bose bakagwara inyoko ngo nivyo maze tukabahumuriza yuko ari ikinyoma, nâ€™uyu munsi turabahumurije yuko ata nzego zâ€™igihugu câ€™Uburundi ziriko zirabahigisha uburozi.

Ni mwiyubare ku bindi, mwiyumvire ingene igihugu canyu coronka amahoro nâ€™umutekano, ubutungane nâ€™iterambere kugira ngo abanyu bazobe mu Burundi bgâ€™Isezerano.

Nti tuzotinya kuvuga ukuri ngo nâ€™uko kurwanywa na benshi ngo natwe botugwanya. Yesu yavuze ngo muzomenya ukuri nakwo kuzobaha ukwidegemvya.

title: Mu kubaho hariho aho abantu badashika mu kugufasha kuko ari Imana yonyene ishoboraÂ kuhagukura.
content:
ABANTU HARI AHO BADASHIKA.

Â«Â Nukwâ€™ashira umwami wâ€™Abisirayeli ico cete, cavuga, ngw Ico cete ni cagushikira, urabona ko nkurungikiye umusavyi wanje Namani ngâ€™umukize imibembe. Mazâ€™ umwami wâ€™Abisirayeli asomye ico cete, yitantamurirakw impuzu ziwe, aravuga, ati Mbega jewe ndâ€™ Imana, ngo ntume umuntu apfa canke ngw abeho, kâ€™uyo mugabo andungikiye umuntu ngo ndamukize imibembe? Ehe raba ingenâ€™ anyigenzako, muheze muvyiyumvire!Â Â»[2 Abami 5:6-7]

Iyi nkuru ivuga kâ€™umugabisha wâ€™ingabo zâ€™abasiriya yitwa Namani yarâ€™arwaye imibembe. Asaba umwami wâ€™abasiriya kuja mubisirayeli kâ€™uwuvugishwa nâ€™Imana Elisa, nawe uwo mwami aca amurungikana icete aha umwami wâ€™abisirayeli. Ico cete camusaba ngo amukize imibembe. Nawe umwami wâ€™abisirayeli asomye ico cete aca ararakara,yitantamurirako impuzu, avuga ati ehe raba ingene anyigenzako, mbega jewe ndi Imana, ngo ntume umuntu apfa canke ngwâ€™ abehoâ€¦?

Akenshi iyo umuntu ari mubibazo hari igihe yiyumvira naka, ati yonkemurira ikibazo,yonyiyumvirako ivyanje vyoca bicemuka. Ariko buriya abana bâ€™abantu barafise aho batagera, kuko nabo wibaza ko boba bafise vyose, nabo buriya bagendana imitwaro ibaremera batabwira abandi, nabo baba bakeneye ubutabazi.

Hari ibibazo bicemurwa nâ€™Imana yonyene. Uzorabe,abantu bogukomeretsa bigakunda, ariko uretsâ€™Imana abantu ntibogukiza ibikomere vyâ€™umutima wahuye navyo. Abantu boguha ibintu(usivye ko naho nyene ari Imana yoba ibakoresheje), ariko ntiboshobora kuguha amahoro yâ€™umutima atuma ubaho wishimye.

Rimwe na rimwe hari igihe umuntu agendana akababaro, ngo ba naka ntibankoreye ibi canke biriya, ariko burya ivyo wibaza ko batagukoreye sivyo vyonyene warâ€™ukeneye kugira ngo ubeho wishimye. Niyo bakabikora, hari kuboneka izindi mpamvu zituma ubabara.

Nkâ€™akarorero, umuntu yokurihira amahera yâ€™ishure. Ariko Imana itabanye nawe ngo iguhe gutahura ivyirwa, wotuntuzwa no kwama muri iryo shure utunguruza. Umuntu yokuronderera akazi bigakunda ariko Imana itaguhaye kugira ikiganza ciza, wotuntuzwa no kubona wama mu nduru nâ€™abo mukorana canke wotuntuzwa no kubona abaza bakugana batakwiyumvamwo.Nimba wipfuza gukorera Imana, abakozi bâ€™Imana (Imana ibibashize kumitima) boshobora kugusengera,bakaguha ibango runaka. Ariko Imana itabanye nawe ngo iguhe ubwenge bwâ€™ingene ubikora, navyo wobitunturiramwo,kuko no mugikorwa câ€™Imana hari intambara umuntu ahura nazo.

Imana rero niyo ishoboye vyose. Ntugahange amaso abana bâ€™abantu kuko  usivye Imana gusa, nta wundi muntu nâ€™umwe yoshobora kugucemurira ibibazo vyose ufise. Nivyo Imana izokoresha abantu kandi nabo ukwiye kuzobibashimira. (kuko sibose bemera ko ibakoresha) ariko ukwiye kumenya ko hari aho abantu batazoshika mu kugutunganiriza ibibazo, usivye Imana gusa.

title: Naho ababisha baguma biyongera, iciza kizotinda kinesha ikibi. Ube mu ruhandeÂ rwâ€™abeza.
content:
ICIZA KIRANESHA IKIBI.

Â«Â Ikibi coye kukunesha, yamara ikibi ukinesheshe iciza.Â Â»[Abaroma 12:21]

Muri kamere yâ€™umwana wâ€™umuntu, gukora ikibi ntibisaba ko avyigishwa. Kuva Adamu acumuye,nâ€™abamukomokako bose bavuka bafise iyo mbuto yo gukora ibibi. Kiretse iyo umuntu yakiriye Yesu, akabatizwa muri Mpwemu Yera, agahinduka icaremwe gishasha. Ico gihe kamere yâ€™Imana ica itangura kuganza.

Ariko rero kameremere ntica ipfa, irabandanya kurwana kugeza upfuye. Nico gituma ataho umuntu agera, kuburyo atoba agisubira inyuma. Harâ€™abibaza ko batoba bagisubira inyuma, ariko sivyo, nimba ucambaye umubiri, burya uracari mu ntambara. Mbere hari nâ€™ababa barageze kure kurusha aho ugeze, ariko basubiye mu vyaha kandi umenga bari bazi vyinshi, baragendanye nâ€™Imana bihagije. Nico gituma bibiliya ivuga ngo mugendeshwe na mpwemu, niho mutazoshitsa ivyo kameremere kanyu kipfuza.

Aha twasomye havuga ngo Â«Â ikibi coye kukunesha, ariko ikibi ukinesheshe icizaÂ Â». Mu yindi mvugo, uburyo bwiza bwo kwirinda ikibi, nâ€™ugukora iciza.

Ushobora kuba ufise ikintu kigutwara umwanya wo gusenga, wo gusoma ijambo ryâ€™Imana. Ico kintu, umusi wafashe umwanya ugiha ukawuharira gusenga, no gusoma ijambo ryâ€™Imana, uko igihe kigenda uzosanga umutima wawe wawerekeje ku Mana, ube uranesheje.

Uramutse ufise integenke zo kuvuga abandi nabi, umusi wihaye intego yo kuza uratera intege abantu no kuza urashima mumajambo yawe ivyo abantu bakora, uko igihe kizogenda uzosanga warabohotse ku kuvuga abandi nabi.

Integenke zawe ashobora kuba ari ukwihebura,ukwiganyira. Umusi woza uratura amajambo yâ€™ivyizigiro, canke ukaza urasubiramwo imirongo ya bibiliya ivuga ukugira neza kwâ€™Imana, uzosanga kwiganyira bigenda bitsindwa.

Â«Â Ikibi coye kukunesha, ariko ikibi ukinesheshe icizaÂ Â»

Mumigenderanire nayo tugiranira nâ€™abandi, birashika umuntu akakugirira nabi, bikakubabaza umutima. Burya uburyo bwiza bwo kubinesha sâ€™ukumusubiriza mu koko,si no kumumaramaza,ahubwo nâ€™ukumukorera iciza mu gishingo câ€™ikibi. Ibi ntivyoroshe ariko usenze Imana yobigushoboza kuko ikibi kiranesha iciza.

Ntidushobora rero kunesha satani mugukora ivyo ashaka, nico gituma nâ€™ubwo abantu boduhemukira,twebwe dukwiye kuba abantu bakora ivyiza aho bishoboka hose, kuko nivyo twahamagariwe.

Duhamagarira umurundi wese eka nâ€™umuntu wese ashobora gusoma aya majambo kwikubita agashi akava mu nzira mbi mu bikorwa, mu mvugo, mu vyiyumviro akama abandanira kuba mu ruhande rwâ€™abariko barahira ibibi vyiza mu kwigisha nâ€™abandi ingeso nziza zibereye abubaha Imana nâ€™abantu.

title: Uhoraho Imana irareka tugaca mu bigeragezo kugira ngo bidukomeze natwe dukomeze abandi kukoÂ adukunda.
